Just made it home before his meeting ends. The matcha cake from that bakery he loves. He'll think I forgot—

A muffled giggle comes from the bedroom. Su Yao freezes. The cake box slips from her fingers, landing with a dull thud.

SONG RUYI (O.S.)
—so different from what I'm used to. Refreshing.

JIANG HE (O.S.)
Five years of playing the good boyfriend. You have no idea.

Su Yao's face goes pale.

JIANG HE (O.S.) (CONT'D)
She's probably at the clinic right now, dreaming about our wedding.

She moves toward the door.

INT. BEDROOM - CONTINUOUS

Jiang He sits up sharply as the door opens. SONG RUYI, adjusting a silk robe, turns with cold curiosity.

JIANG HE
Yaoyao—this isn't—

SU YAO
What it looks like?

She takes in the scene—scattered clothes, the unmade bed, the expensive perfume that isn't hers.

SONG RUYI
You're early.

Song Ruyi ties her robe, picks up a limited-edition watch from the nightstand.

SONG RUYI (CONT'D)
Jiang He was just explaining how you put him through school. Very touching.

Jiang He scrambles for his shirt.

SU YAO (to Jiang He)
The night shifts. The loans in my name. Your mother calling me her daughter—

JIANG HE
You don't understand the pressure! Song Ruyi can get me the fellowship—

SONG RUYI
Can make all his problems disappear. But first, he needs to prove he's serious.

She studies Su Yao like a specimen.
continuation:
SONG RUYI (CONT'D)
Hit her. Once. Then we can talk.

JIANG HE
What? No—

SU YAO (to Jiang He)
Don't.

She looks at Song Ruyi.

SU YAO (CONT'D)
Don't degrade yourself more.

Jiang He sees the contempt in Song Ruyi's smile, the pity in Su Yao's eyes. His hand rises.

The slap cracks across Su Yao's cheek. Her head turns, but she doesn't move.

SONG RUYI
Again. Say the words.

JIANG HE (voice breaking)
I love Song Ruyi.

Second slap.

SONG RUYI
Tell her it's over.

JIANG HE
We're done!

Third strike. Su Yao steps back, touches her lip. Looks at the blood. Then laughs—a sharp sound.

SU YAO
Five years. I thought I was building a life.

She turns, spine straight.

SU YAO (CONT'D)
Happy birthday, Jiang He.

She exits.

INT. BAR - NIGHT

SU YAO sits at the bar, a single glass in front of her. Her cheek is swollen. She twists the engagement ring off her finger.

A MAN watches from a corner booth, phone showing a news article: SONG GROUP SCANDAL.

Su Yao stands, steadies herself. Walks toward the exit, drops the ring in a tips jar.

The Man rises. Their paths intersect at the door.

Their eyes meet—his sharp with recognition, hers clear with purpose.

ON SCREEN: TO BE CONTINUED

title: After Being Betrayed, I Became the CEO's Treasure
description: A heartbroken young woman who discovers her boyfriend's infidelity finds herself handcuffed by a mysterious man in a KTV room, leading to an unexpected turn in her life.
context:
Title: After Being Betrayed, I Became the CEO's Treasure
Description: A heartbroken young woman who discovers her boyfriend's infidelity finds herself handcuffed by a mysterious man in a KTV room, leading to an unexpected turn in her life.

INT. KTV PRIVATE ROOM - NIGHT

Music plays dimly from the sound system. JIANG CHENG sits alone on the sofa, surrounded by empty bottles. Her face is tear-streaked as she stares at her silent phone. The screen shows her last message to "Haoze" - unread, three hours ago. She takes another drink, her hands trembling.

She checks her phone again. Still nothing. Her bitter laugh dissolves into a sob.

JIANG CHENG
(whispering)
Three years... and you can't even text me back.

Her phone slips from her fingers. She leans back, eyes closing.

A pair of men's dress shoes stops beside the sofa. A SECURITY BADGE gleams at the belt.

JIANG CHENG's eyes flutter open. She sees the man through a haze.

JIANG CHENG
(mumbling)
...not causing trouble. Just... tired.

The man - crisp suit, impassive face - produces professional-grade zip-tie cuffs and secures her wrist to the table leg.

ON SCREEN: Sincere devotion, misplaced. Who holds the key to her heart's prison?

EXT. PLAZA - DAY

(FLASHBACK)

JIANG CHENG in a bulky frog mascot costume staggers in the midday heat, handing out flyers for a PHONE COMPANY PROMOTION. Sweat drips inside the foam head. Passersby ignore her.

JIANG CHENG (O.S.)
(muffled, exhausted)
Free case with purchase...

She collapses onto a bench, removes the headpiece, gasping. Her phone shows her bank balance: ¥9,120. She smiles through the exhaustion.

JIANG CHENG
(to herself)
Enough. Finally enough.
continuation:
INT. PHONE STORE - DAY

JIANG CHENG examines the latest phone model, her reflection showing dark circles under her eyes.

STORE CLERK
Finalizing the payment?

JIANG CHENG
Yes. It's... for someone important.

She scans the QR code. ¥8,999. Her thumb hovers, then confirms.

STORE CLERK
Packing it now.

JIANG CHENG dials a number. It rings.

INT. HOTEL ROOM - DAY

(SCENE CUTS)

MU HAOZE, shirtless, reaches for his phone on the nightstand. HUO YUSHAN traces patterns on his chest.

MU HAOZE
It's Jiang Cheng.

HUO YUSHAN
Let her hear how little she matters.

MU HAOZE answers, putting it on speaker.

JIANG CHENG (O.S.)
Haoze? I have a surprise for you. I'm coming over—

A moan cuts through. The sound of silk sheets rustling. Jiang Cheng's voice stops.

MU HAOZE (O.S.)
(to Huo Yushan)
She's nothing compared to you.

The phone goes dead.

INT. PHONE STORE - DAY

JIANG CHENG stares at her phone, the gift box at her feet. The STORE CLERK's voice is distant.

STORE CLERK (O.S.)
Miss? Your receipt...

Tears fall on the shattered screen of her old phone, dropped on the tile.

ON SCREEN: Some prisons have no bars. Some treasures are found in ruins.

title: Mr. Jiang's Beloved Wife
description: Three years ago, a woman breaks up with her dying lover to protect him from the burden of her terminal illness.
context:
Title: Mr. Jiang's Beloved Wife
Description: Three years ago, a woman breaks up with her dying lover to protect him from the burden of her terminal illness.

INT. HOSPITAL ROOM - DAY

SUPER: Three years ago

JIANG CI lies in a hospital bed, oxygen mask fogging with each labored breath. Bandaged hands rest on white sheets—he's reduced to tubes and tremors. His eyes track only NAN ZHI.

She stands at the foot of the bed, gripping her purse until her knuckles whiten.

NAN ZHI
You had them page me. Said it was critical. Did you think nearly dying would make me forget why I left?

JIANG CI
(whispering)
Can't... leave it like this...

NAN ZHI
You think love's a magic trick? You're breaking apart, and I'm supposed to glue myself back together waiting for pieces?

She moves closer—cruelly close—her voice a scalpel.
continuation:
NAN ZHI
You're not the future I signed up for. You're just the past that won't let go.

The heart monitor flatlines—a single, endless tone.

Nan Zhi doesn't flinch. She turns and walks out. The door clicks shut.

Jiang Ci rips at his IV, dragging himself from the bed. He crashes to the floor, bandaged fingers reaching toward the empty doorway.

INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR - DAY

Nan Zhi slides down the closed door, landing hard.

DOCTOR (V.O.)
Miss Mu, you need to start treatment immediately. The cancer is aggressive. Your chances...

She shoves a fist into her mouth, biting down on her knuckles. A folded biopsy report falls from her coat.

NAN ZHI
(muffled)
Can't... let you bury yourself with me...

She curls into the space where door meets floor, shaking, soundless.

title: Crushed Tenderness
description: A blind woman is hunted through an abandoned factory by her abusive boyfriend who wants to use her pregnancy with a wealthy heir's child as leverage.
context:
Title: Crushed Tenderness
Description: A blind woman is hunted through an abandoned factory by her abusive boyfriend who wants to use her pregnancy with a wealthy heir's child as leverage.

INT. ABANDONED FACTORY - NIGHT

A fire burns in a rusted barrel. Smoke hangs in the air.

LU ZHIYUAN, blind from birth, runs panicked. Her white dress is blood-stained.

FENG CHAO (O.S.)
Where did that blind bitch run off to!

Lu stumbles and falls. She crawls behind a concrete barrier.

Feng Chao emerges with a torch, searching.

FENG CHAO (O.S.)
Come out here!

FENG CHAO
Little treasure, come out now, stop hiding.

Lu hides, trembling with fear.

FENG CHAO
Miss Lu, stop running. You're carrying the Bo family's eldest grandson in your belly.

Lu's hand goes protectively to her stomach.

Feng Chao walks up a metal staircase.

FENG CHAO
As long as you go to the Bo family and they acknowledge you, our future will be completely secure. Just come out obediently, and I won't beat you anymore.

FLASHBACK BEGINS:
continuation:
INT. KTV HALLWAY - NIGHT

FENG CHAO roughly shoves LU ZHIYUAN against the bar.

LU ZHIYUAN
Go to hell!

FENG CHAO
Little cutie, you slut!

LU ZHIYUAN (crying)
I'm your woman, how can you force me to sleep with another man?

FENG CHAO
Lu Zhiyuan, you slut! I used to think you had the Lu family inheritance backing you. For five years I've fed you and clothed you, you should repay me now. Right now, I'm just making you pay back your debt with your body.

FENG CHAO grabs LU ZHIYUAN by the throat, pinning her against the wall.

FENG CHAO
Lu Zhiyuan, listen carefully! I drugged the drink of Bo Wang, the young master of Bo Corporation. You're going to sleep with him right now! Understand? You slut!

FENG CHAO pushes LU ZHIYUAN into a room and locks the door.

LU ZHIYUAN (O.S.)
Feng Chao, let me out! Let me out!

Bo Wang's hand reaches for her from the shadows.

INT. CAR - NIGHT

LU ZHIYUAN and BO WANG are in the back seat. She struggles desperately.

LU ZHIYUAN
No! No! Let me go!

BO WANG
Miss Lu, you're safe. I promise.

FLASHBACK ENDS.

INT. ABANDONED FACTORY - NIGHT

LU ZHIYUAN hides in a corner, clutching a medical report. Her fingers read Braille: POSITIVE.

FENG CHAO (O.S.)
Come out! You little slut, where are you hiding? Come out!

LU ZHIYUAN (inner monologue)
Child, although I only conceived you because I was used by someone, you are still mother's only family in this world. Mother will do everything to protect you, and will never let you be used as a bargaining chip.

Feng Chao's footsteps grow closer.

BO WANG appears and touches Lu's shoulder. The pregnancy report falls.

BO WANG
Miss Lu, I finally found you.

Lu raises a sharp metal fragment, defiant.

BO WANG
Tell me, whose child are you carrying in your belly?

He catches the report, fingers the Braille.

BO WANG
Let me help you.

She hears Feng Chao approaching. She makes her choice.

LU ZHIYUAN
Get me out. Please.

BO WANG leads her away as Feng Chao's yell echoes.

FADE OUT.

title: The Group's Beloved Heiress Has Her Identity Exposed Again
description: A young woman raised as a servant discovers her true identity when her powerful brothers come to take her home.
context:
Title: The Group's Beloved Heiress Has Her Identity Exposed Again
Description: A young woman raised as a servant discovers her true identity when her powerful brothers come to take her home.

INT. OFFICE - DAY

MU GUANG stands at the window, a silhouette against the city skyline. FEMALE ASSISTANT enters with a tablet.

FEMALE ASSISTANT
Young Master Mu, this is the scholarship recipient from the provincial program.

She hands him the tablet. MU GUANG studies the screen—MU LI's photo, her eyes hauntingly familiar.

INSERT: DNA report. 99.9% paternal match.

FEMALE ASSISTANT (CONT'D)
The mandatory screening your foundation sponsors. Her sample lit up the family genome archive.

MU GUANG's knuckles whiten on the tablet.

MU GUANG
Get the car. Now.

INT. OFFICE/LABORATORY/ESPORTS ROOM - DAY

MONTAGE - THE BROTHERS ARE ACTIVATED

MU GUANG sends a text: "Location confirmed. Wu residence. Move."

INT. BOARDROOM - DAY

MU JING presides over a hostile takeover meeting. His phone BUZZES. He stands, throwing documents down.

MU JING
Deal's dead. I have family business.
continuation:
INT. RESEARCH LAB - DAY

MU SI explains a compound microscope to interns. Phone BUZZES. He strips off his lab coat.

MU SI
Grant presentation is postponed. Indefinitely.

INT. ESPORTS TRAINING ROOM - DAY

MU CHEN wears headphones, mid-ranked match. Phone lights up. He forfeits immediately.

MU CHEN
(into mic)
Family emergency. Gotta go.

EXT. CHINESE-STYLE COURTYARD - DAY

The four brothers converge from different directions at the Wu family's gate.

FOUR BROTHERS
(in unison)
Little sister, your brothers are here.

EXT. COURTYARD STEPS - DAY

MU LI sits on cracked steps, reading a vintage mathematics text. She carefully mends a torn page with tape.

INT. COURTYARD - DAY

MU LI enters, still reading. WU MEI bursts out, clutching a past-due notice.

WU MEI
The school called again. Another perfect score—so what? You think that makes you special?

She rips the book from MU LI's hands.

WU MEI (CONT'D)
This garbage! You think books will feed you?

She throws it down. MU LI's jaw tightens, but she doesn't move.

MU LI
(measured)
That book is library property. I work there three nights a week to pay for my school fees.

WU MEI
You ungrateful—

MU GUANG (O.S.)
The arrangement ends today.

All four brothers fill the courtyard entrance. WU MEI pales.

MU GUANG walks past her, retrieves MU LI's book, hands it back to her.

MU GUANG
(quiet)
I'm Mu Guang. We've been looking for you, Mu Li.

MU LI's fingers tighten on the book. She searches his face.

ON SCREEN: TO BE CONTINUED

title: THE PEERLESS KING
description: A humble delivery driver conceals a legendary past as the master who trained four war gods. When imperial tradition collides with modern life, he must choose between the quiet existence he craves and the destiny that refuses to let him go.
context:
Title: THE PEERLESS KING
Description: A humble delivery driver conceals a legendary past as the master who trained four war gods. When imperial tradition collides with modern life, he must choose between the quiet existence he craves and the destiny that refuses to let him go.

EXT. STREET SIDE - DAY

Several DELIVERY WORKERS in branded uniforms share a meal around their parked scooters. Steam rises from takeout containers. The city hums in the background.

CHUBBY COLLEAGUE
Hey, Chu Chen. Your dad still setting you up on those blind dates?

CHU CHEN
(leaning against his scooter)
It's a disaster. Last one asked about my salary before my name.

WISE COLLEAGUE
(grinning)
You're a good man. My daughter's too young, but I'd put in a word if I could.

CHUBBY COLLEAGUE
(laughing, mouth full)
With your ugly mug? She'd run for the hills.

The delivery app on Chu Chen's phone chirps.

PHONE NOTIFICATION (V.O.)
New order confirmed. Priority pickup.

CHU CHEN
(capping his thermos)
Gotta bounce. Cover for me?

He tosses his half-eaten meal to Chubby Colleague.

CHUBBY COLLEAGUE
(calling after)
You're too nice, bro!

A procession of twelve WOMEN in tailored black suits rounds the corner. Their synchronized stride draws every eye. At their head is ZHU QUE, her presence magnetic and unmistakable.

STARSTRUCK COLLEAGUE
(whispering, awestruck)
That's her. That's War God Zhu Que. I saw her feature last month...

WISE COLLEAGUE
She sealed the northern borders three years running. What is she doing in our district?

CHUBBY COLLEAGUE
(urgent whisper)
Show some respect!

The workers and nearby PEDESTRIANS begin to kneel, heads bowed.

CHU CHEN
(quietly, to himself)
Not this again.

CHUBBY COLLEAGUE
(panicked whisper)
Chen! Get down!

Chu Chen steps forward instead, casual in his worn delivery jacket.

CHU CHEN
Zhu Que. We're in public.

Zhu Que's disciplined mask cracks. She drops to one knee on the pavement, heedless of the dirt.

ZHU QUE
Master. Forgive this interruption.

HER GUARDS
(in perfect unison)
Master.

A hush falls. Chubby Colleague's takeout container slips from his hands.

CHU CHEN
(sighs)
I trained you better than this. On your feet. All of you.

Zhu Que rises, her bearing military-perfect. She produces a sealed scroll from her jacket.

ZHU QUE
continuation:
The Council's decree. They refused my petition to let you remain—

CHU CHEN
(holds up a hand)
Don't. Not here.

ZHU QUE
(quietly urgent)
Your three senior disciples hold the peace across the territories. The northern clans, the eastern seas, the western plains... they all answer to us. To you. The Council needs a symbol.

CHU CHEN
I have a job. See this uniform?

ZHU QUE
(pleading)
Just read the decree. Please.

Chu Chen breaks the seal. His eyes scan the document. His shoulders tighten.

CHU CHEN (V.O.)
They never understand. Power isn't a gift. It's a cage.

He looks at his colleagues—his friends—frozen in shock.

CHU CHEN
(to Zhu Que)
Get your people out of here. I'll consider it.

ZHU QUE
Master—

CHU CHEN
That's an order.

Zhu Que snaps a salute. The procession melts away as swiftly as it appeared.

WISE COLLEAGUE
(voice shaking)
Chu Chen... what did she call you?

CHU CHEN
(shouldering his delivery bag)
A ghost from someone else's life. Lunch is on me tomorrow.

He walks off, phone already ringing.

CHU CHEN
(into phone)
Dad, I'm working—

CHU CHEN'S FATHER (O.S.)
(no-nonsense)
The hotel address is in your messages. Be there in forty minutes. Don't you dare disappoint her.

The line goes dead. Chu Chen stares at his screen.

INT. CLOUD PEAK HOTEL - GOLDEN LOBBY - DAY

Chu Chen enters, still in his work clothes. He smooths his hair and approaches the concierge.

CONCIERGE
(coldly)
Deliveries are the service entrance.

CHU CHEN
I'm meeting someone.

The concierge's skeptical glance slides down Chu Chen's worn sneakers.

CONCIERGE
(sarcastic)
Of course. Room 208. The Sapphire Suite.

INT. HOTEL CORRIDOR - DAY

Chu Chen walks the plush carpet. At the door marked 208, he pauses. Through the crack, he glimpses a woman's hand—manicured, poised—pouring tea with deliberate grace. A diamond bracelet catches the light.

The hand stills. She knows he's there.

CHU CHEN
(under his breath)
This should be interesting.

He raises his hand to knock.

title: Untitled Script
description: A taxi driver intervenes when a local thug harasses a woman after a traffic incident.
context:
Title: Untitled Script
Description: A taxi driver intervenes when a local thug harasses a woman after a traffic incident.

EXT. ROADSIDE - DAY

A yellow taxi idles by a quiet roadside. XIAO SONG (20s, weary eyes, taxi driver uniform) steps out, stretching stiff shoulders.

COLLEAGUE BROTHER (40s, weathered suit) waits by the curb with a plastic bag of breakfast.

XIAO SONG
Brother.

XIAO SONG takes the bag.

XIAO SONG
Thanks for this.

COLLEAGUE BROTHER
Another month of doubles? You're running yourself into the ground.

XIAO SONG
Anniversary today. Want to make it special.

COLLEAGUE BROTHER
(snorts)
She's a lucky woman.

XIAO SONG offers a tired smile. COLLEAGUE BROTHER clasps his shoulder, then gets in the car and drives off. XIAO SONG stands by the road, eating in the morning light.

EXT. ROAD UNDER BRIDGE - DAY

A white BMW and a black sedan sit by the roadside, hazard lights blinking. Traffic echoes from the overpass above.

LUO YIHONG (30s, expensive jacket, entitled swagger) blocks HONG GU (20s, business attire, trembling hands) from her car door.

LUO YIHONG
You break like you own the whole road.

HONG GU reaches into her car for her insurance papers.

HONG GU
This covers everything. We're done here.

LUO YIHONG slams her car door shut.

LUO YIHONG
I don't do insurance.

He steps closer, invading her space.

LUO YIHONG
One drink. We call it even.

HONG GU
I don't drink with strangers.
continuation:
LUO YIHONG
We'll fix that.

His hand moves toward her face. She slaps it away.

HONG GU
Don't.

LUO YIHONG
(chuckles)
You have no idea what you're missing.

HONG GU
I'm not missing anything.

LUO YIHONG
What did you just say to me?

XIAO SONG walks over from nearby.

XIAO SONG
Problem here?

LUO YIHONG turns, sizing him up.

LUO YIHONG
Private matter.

XIAO SONG
(to Hong Gu)
You okay, miss?

HONG GU
(quickly)
I'm fine. Please, just go.

LUO YIHONG
(to Xiao Song)
You know who you're talking to? Luo Yihong. My family built this district.

XIAO SONG
(to Hong Gu)
You know him?

HONG GU
Never seen him before today.

LUO YIHONG
(laughs)
Liar.

LUO YIHONG signals with a small hand gesture. Two MEN in black shirts step from a nearby car, hands loose at their sides.

LUO YIHONG
I tried to be reasonable.

The two men move forward, flanking Xiao Song on both sides.

title: Dragon Guard God Level - Shen Lang Returns
description: A legendary warrior returns to find his comrades under attack by the Yama Hall assassins at the border.
context:
Title: Dragon Guard God Level - Shen Lang Returns
Description: A legendary warrior returns to find his comrades under attack by the Yama Hall assassins at the border.

INT. PLAZA - NIGHT

FAST CUTS: An intense battle unfolds. Dragon Hall warriors in camouflage uniforms clash fiercely with men in black. Blades flash, bodies fall.

A Dragon Hall warrior is cut down by a man in black.

Hordes of men in black charge out from under a magnificent gate tower, their momentum fierce.

The Dragon Hall warriors engage in a chaotic melee with the men in black. The battle is massive, both sides fighting fiercely, people constantly falling.

One Dragon Hall warrior (WARRIOR) survives the battle but is covered in wounds. He looks around - the ground is littered with the corpses of comrades and enemies.

WARRIOR
(strained)
Hold the line...

The remaining men in black surround the WARRIOR. He fights back desperately, taking down several more, but finally collapses to his knees from exhaustion and injury.

The WARRIOR struggles toward a red banner emblazoned with the character "Dragon," painfully planting it in the ground.

NARRATOR (V.O.)
While the Dragon Banner stands, none shall cross our border.

The YAMA HALL LEADER (a fat man in armor) jumps down from above, laughing triumphantly.

YAMA HALL LEADER
(laughing)
Ha ha ha! Since the Dragon God retired, your Dragon King Hall is nothing but a rabble. Today, I will wipe you all out!

The WARRIOR pulls out a golden token from his chest. It pulses with faint light.

WARRIOR
The ones who will die are you.

YAMA HALL LEADER
(shocked)
The Dragon Token? How do you have the Dragon Token?

WARRIOR
When the Divine Token appears, all must submit! That lord will avenge us!

YAMA HALL LEADER
(laughing maniacally)
Ha ha ha! So what if it's the Dragon Token? Today I'm going to kill you! Yah!

The YAMA HALL LEADER raises his blade to strike the WARRIOR. Suddenly, a man in a tank top, shorts, and flip-flops (SHEN LANG) appears, talking on his phone while casually blocking the leader's attack with a sword.

SHEN LANG
(into phone)
Hello, honey. Hey, speak louder, it's really noisy here.

YAMA HALL LEADER
Who are you?

YAMA HALL LEADER
Black and White Demons, attack!

Two masked figures (BLACK AND WHITE DEMONS) charge at SHEN LANG.

SHEN LANG
(into phone)
Hey, honey, I really am saving the border. I'm not lying to you, believe me. Why would I lie to you?

SHEN LANG continues his phone call while effortlessly dodging and defeating the Black and White Demons.

SHEN LANG
(into phone)
Come on, send me a voice message. Huh?

Golden electric light emanates from the Black and White Demons' bodies before they collapse.

SHEN LANG
(hanging up)
Huh? Honey?

WARRIOR
(weakly)
Dragon God, sir! They're from Yama Hall, don't let them go!

SHEN LANG
Yama Hall?

SHEN LANG
Kneel.
continuation:
INT. SHEN FAMILY VILLA - DAY (FLASHBACK)

SHEN'S FATHER and SHEN'S MOTHER kneel on the ground, surrounded by masked Yama Hall assassins. Their hands are bound with black iron chains.

SHEN'S FATHER
Please don't kill us, spare us.

YAMA HALL ASSASSIN
Remember, the ones who killed you are from Yama Hall!

The assassin swings his blade. SHEN'S FATHER and MOTHER fall in pools of blood.

END FLASHBACK.

INT. PLAZA - NIGHT

YAMA HALL LEADER
Dragon God, die!

The YAMA HALL LEADER charges at SHEN LANG. SHEN LANG extends a finger. The leader clutches his chest in pain and staggers back several steps.

SHEN LANG
(sighing)
Geez, just these few small fries, and you can't even handle them? Can you guys step it up a bit?

WARRIOR
(ashamed)
Dragon God, sir...

SHEN LANG
(sighing)
Sigh.

WARRIOR
(kneeling, presenting the Dragon Token with both hands)
The Dragon Token is here. What right do I have to hold this Divine Token?

SHEN LANG
Remember, you need to stand strong.

SHEN LANG'S eyes become sharp.

SHEN LANG
Yama Hall!

SHEN LANG turns. His casual clothes instantly transform into mighty black armor, flames roaring in the background. Ghostly Dragon banners materialize around him.

FADE OUT.

title: My Delivery is Not Simple
description: A young delivery man takes a mysterious job from an old woman, only to discover his customer is something beyond the living world.
context:
Title: My Delivery is Not Simple
Description: A young delivery man takes a mysterious job from an old woman, only to discover his customer is something beyond the living world.

INT. ZHONG PO'S SHOP - NIGHT

Incense smoke fills a cramped apothecary. ZHONG PO (70s) counts prayer beads.

ZHONG PO
The deliveries from my shop are not for ordinary people to handle.

LI XINGYONG (20s), in a worn delivery uniform, checks his phone. An overdraft notice glows.

ZHONG PO
Young man. Are you present?

LI XINGYONG
(startled)
Sorry. What?

ZHONG PO
Can you handle the unusual?

LI XINGYONG
(exhales)
I'm three months behind on rent. Unusual is fine, so long as it pays cash.

ZHONG PO studies him. Slides a black package across the counter—wax paper, red thread.

ZHONG PO
Old dental clinic on Fushou Road. Half an hour. No later. Don't untie the thread. Don't look inside. Knock three times, then leave it at the threshold.

LI XINGYONG
Threshold. Got it.

He tucks the package into his bag.
continuation:
EXT. ALLEY - NIGHT

Rain slicks the cobblestones. LI XINGYONG rides his scooter through the darkness, the package secured. He checks his watch: 23:47.

EXT. OLD DENTAL CLINIC - NIGHT

A condemned stone building. LI XINGYONG consults the address. The red thread glimmers faintly.

He knocks three times. The sound echoes.

He waits.

Nothing.

He places the package at the threshold.

His phone BUZZES. He answers.

LI XINGYONG
(into phone)
Zhong Po? I'm here.

A WITHERED HAND slides from beneath the door—translucent, rotting. It closes around the package.

LI XINGYONG
(into phone, voice tight)
Your customer...

The hand retreats, pulling the package inside. A muffled voice from within:

MUFFLED VOICE (O.S.)
Thank you... I was so hungry.

LI XINGYONG hangs up. Kneels. Peers through the keyhole.

Inside: darkness, a single candle, a black-and-white portrait of an elderly man.

LI XINGYONG
(whisper)
What did I just feed?

He touches his wallet in his pocket. Slowly stands. Looks back at the building.

The red thread lies on the threshold, untied.

FADE OUT.

title: Dragon Cauldron
description: A legendary general returns victorious from the Western Regions to rescue his wife, only to face political intrigue at the imperial court.
context:
Title: Dragon Cauldron
Description: A legendary general returns victorious from the Western Regions to rescue his wife, only to face political intrigue at the imperial court.

INT. BARBARIAN CAMP - NIGHT

A signal flare erupts above the barbarian camp, showering amber sparks. Scattered bonfires illuminate celebrating warriors.

The EMPRESS OF JINGJUE reclines on furs, toying with a dagger etched with Xia characters.

EMPRESS OF JINGJUE
Bring me the Xia general. Let her hear our songs of victory.

A BARBARIAN GENERAL on horseback rallies the crowd.

Soldiers drag MU QINGLUAN into the firelight. Her armor hangs in tatters, blood crusted at her temple. They drop her at the Empress's feet.

MU QINGLUAN
(struggling to rise)
Jingjue dogs... you'll never break the Xia border.

EMPRESS OF JINGJUE
(rising, smiling)
We already have. Tonight, we break your spirit.

The camp erupts. Warriors bang swords against shields.

BARBARIAN GENERAL
The Xia dragon is toothless! Let her blood feed our fires!

A flaming arrow pierces the central bonfire. Coals spray skyward. Silence.

EMPRESS OF JINGJUE
(shielding her face)
Archers! Formation--

A figure in scarred armor—LIN YANG—leaps from the darkness behind the Empress's couch, blade drawn.

LIN YANG
The Xia dragon still has fangs.

He cuts down the nearest guards in two fluid strokes.

MU QINGLUAN (V.O.)
Husband... I knew you'd come.

EMPRESS OF JINGJUE
(backing away)
Dingyuan? You left the capital undefended?
continuation:
LIN YANG
(reaching Mu Qingluan)
My wife is my capital.

He pulls her to her feet. She leans against him, trembling.

EMPRESS OF JINGJUE
(signals hidden archers)
A touching sentiment. Pity you brought no army.

Horns sound. Xia cavalry burst through the treeline, torches ablaze.

JIU FENG
(galloping forward)
My Lord! Elite vanguard in position. The main force encircles the valley.

LIN YANG
(cradling Mu Qingluan)
Take the Empress alive. Her ransom will rebuild our western forts.

JIU FENG
And the camp?

LIN YANG
Burn it. Let the ash warn the other thirty-five kingdoms.

EXT. GREAT XIA IMPERIAL PALACE ENTRANCE - DAY

Two weeks later. Morning mist clings to the palace steps.

NARRATOR (V.O.)
Lord Dingyuan returns with the Empress as hostage, thirty-five treaties signed in blood, and a wife who refuses to leave his side—even in the capital's den of wolves.

LIN YANG, ceremonial mask covering the scar on his jaw, climbs the steps. JIU FENG follows, watching the shadows.

YUAN HONG
(approaching with open hands)
Lord Dingyuan. The King honors your victory with the Nine Cauldrons Banquet. A first in three dynasties.

LIN YANG
The King's generosity weighs heavily.

YUAN HONG
Your wife insisted on delivering this personally. She waits in the east chamber.

He produces a wax-sealed scroll. Lin Yang's fingers hesitate before breaking the seal. His knuckles whiten. The mask hides his expression, but his hand tremors slightly.

LIN YANG
(to Jiu Feng, voice low)
Double the guard on my wife's chambers. No one enters without my word.

title: The Scandal Plan
description: Zhong Xing'an is a small-time actress working as a stunt double in the entertainment industry, dreaming of her big break while facing harassment from a sleazy producer.
context:
Title: The Scandal Plan
Description: Zhong Xing'an is a small-time actress working as a stunt double in the entertainment industry, dreaming of her big break while facing harassment from a sleazy producer.

INT. BAR/FILM SET - NIGHT

ZHONG XING'AN (V.O.)
My name is Zhong Xing'an. I'm a stunt double. Actresses get close-ups. I get bruises and producers who think "no" is just the opening offer.

ACTION
A bar set on a soundstage. Zhong Xing'an executes a flawless spin kick, sending a man in a black suit crashing into breakaway furniture. She barely pauses before dropping another attacker.

DIRECTOR (O.S.)
Cut! Cut!

ACTION
The DIRECTOR emerges from behind the monitor, clapping slowly. He's in his 50s with an oily smile.

DIRECTOR
Impressive improvisation. But my female lead doesn't fight back—she swoons. We should discuss your interpretation. Tonight. Over drinks.

ZHONG XING'AN
(flat smile)
I'll have my agent check my calendar.

DIRECTOR
(leaning in, slipping a key card into her pocket)
Don't bother. Smart girls make their own opportunities.

ACTION
Zhong Xing'an's jaw tightens. She pockets the card.
continuation:
INT. GU CORPORATION OFFICE - DAY

ACTION
A glass office tower. Young Master Gu reclines behind a mahogany desk, flicking a lighter. Zhong Xing'an enters, composed, tablet in hand.

YOUNG MASTER GU
The stunt girl who ghosted me. To what do I owe this honor?

ZHONG XING'AN
You offered a "private meeting" about the female lead. Here I am.

YOUNG MASTER GU
And the terms? Last time you mentioned principles.

ZHONG XING'AN
(smiling slightly)
I said I wouldn't bend for small money. For Gu Corporation's flagship production? I'm... flexible.

ACTION
Young Master Gu circles her, rests a hand on her hip.

YOUNG MASTER GU
What did you have in mind?

ZHONG XING'AN
(turning to face him)
First, I need to know—do you prefer it rough?

YOUNG MASTER GU
(delighted)
You read my mind.

ACTION
Zhong Xing'an's fingers trail up his chest—then shove him hard. She yanks his belt off in one motion.

YOUNG MASTER GU
(gasping)
What—

ZHONG XING'AN
(loudly, clearly)
THIS is for every "private meeting" you force on girls trying to work!

ACTION
She cracks the belt across his desk. He flinches. She advances.

YOUNG MASTER GU
(scrambling backward)
Security! SECURITY!

ACTION
She herds him toward the door.

ZHONG XING'AN
(raising voice)
Harassing actresses! Blacklisting those who say no! How many careers?

ACTION
The door opens—a handsome man in a black coat (GU SHIXING) stands in the corridor with several SECURITY GUARDS. Young Master Gu collapses behind him.

YOUNG MASTER GU
Brother! This psychopath assaulted me!

ACTION
Gu Shixing surveys: Zhong Xing'an holding the belt, breathing hard; his cowering brother; the tablet on the floor, camera light blinking.

GU SHIXING
(to Zhong Xing'an)
You've made your point. Creatively.

ACTION
He nods. The guards step aside. Zhong Xing'an locks eyes with Gu Shixing, then walks out, head high. Young Master Gu trembles.

FADE OUT.

title: Yan's Little Darling
description: A young woman returns to reclaim what was taken from her family, confronting the heir to the empire built on her family's ruin.
context:
Title: Yan's Little Darling
Description: A young woman returns to reclaim what was taken from her family, confronting the heir to the empire built on her family's ruin.

INT. INTERVIEW ROOM - DAY

Three interviewers sit on one side: YAN WANGSHU, DING YAO, and another MALE INTERVIEWER. LIN CHI (WEN RAN) sits across from them.

LIN CHI
My name is Lin Chi. I'm here to interview for the designer assistant position.

DING YAO picks up Lin Chi's resume and glances at it with thinly veiled disdain.

DING YAO
(to Yan Wangshu)
Self-taught applicant. No university credentials.

LIN CHI
(confidently)
This year's Jewelry Star Design Competition gold medalist. The design drawings on your desk are qualification enough.

YAN WANGSHU picks up the design drawings and looks at Ding Yao with measured interest.

YAN WANGSHU
Ding Yao. You lost to this candidate.

YAN WANGSHU puts down the drawings and studies Lin Chi.

YAN WANGSHU
Tell me, why do you want to work at Yan's Jewelry as a designer assistant?

LIN CHI
(looking directly at him)
Because of you, Yan Wangshu.

YAN WANGSHU
You think just because you changed your name, I wouldn't find you?
continuation:
INT. WEN FAMILY MANSION - DAY (FLASHBACK - SIXTEEN YEARS AGO)

YOUNG YAN WANGSHU stands with his GRANDFATHER. YOUNG WEN RAN holds an exquisite filigree incense box.

YOUNG YAN WANGSHU
(pointing at the box)
Grandfather, I want this one.

GRANDFATHER
(proudly)
My grandson has good taste. This is the only filigree incense box of its kind in the world.
(to Wen Ran's father)
Wrap it for the young master.

WEN RAN'S FATHER tries to take the incense box from his daughter.

YOUNG WEN RAN
(clutching it tightly)
It's Mother's work! I won't give it up!

A SUBORDINATE rushes in, pale-faced.

SUBORDINATE
Master Wen! Old Master Wen... he's on the roof!

The incense box slips from Young Wen Ran's hands and falls to the floor with a deafening clang.

INT. INTERVIEW ROOM - DAY

LIN CHI takes out a wooden box from her bag and places it on the table with deliberate care.

LIN CHI
Yan's Jewelry gave the filigree incense box as this year's competition grand prize.

She opens the box. The filigree glints under fluorescent lights.

LIN CHI
Why is the one I received a fake?

YAN WANGSHU
(seriously)
What makes you say it's fake?

Their eyes lock. Yan Wangshu's fingers drum the table, a calculated gesture.

LIN CHI
Mother's filigree had 1,847 joints. This has 1,846.

She traces a nearly invisible seam. Yan Wangshu's breathing stills.

YAN WANGSHU
The real one has been waiting.

He slides the assistant contract across the steel table. Lin Chi's hand trembles as she reaches for it.

FADE TO BLACK.

title: Peerless Xiao Clan
description: A construction worker named Xiao Fan warns a powerful CEO about a business deal, revealing hidden knowledge that hints at his mysterious past.
context:
Title: Peerless Xiao Clan
Description: A construction worker named Xiao Fan warns a powerful CEO about a business deal, revealing hidden knowledge that hints at his mysterious past.

EXT. CONSTRUCTION SITE - DAY

XIAO FAN (30s), calloused hands and weathered work clothes, wipes grease from a wrench. He glances at his phone—financial headlines scroll past. He pockets it, shaking his head.

A convoy of black SUVs tears onto the site, kicking up dust. BODYGUARDS fan out as XIA YOURAN (30s) emerges, sharp suit, sharper eyes. EXECUTIVES scurry behind her.

The machine beside Xiao Fan SPUTTERS. His CO-WORKER fumbles the controls—CRACK! A piston slams down, knocking Xiao Fan back.

CO-WORKER A
Shit! You okay?

CO-WORKER B
(staring at the motorcade)
That's Xia Youran. Tianyu Group's CEO.

XIAO FAN
(clutching his shoulder)
I know who she is.

CO-WORKER B
You? Man, you don't even use Instagram.

Xiao Fan looks at his oil-stained hands, then at Xia Youran—who's now twenty yards away, surrounded by her board.

XIA YOURAN
Block 3. Status?

MANAGER ZHANG
Longding's still in play.

MANAGER WANG
They've shadowed us on three bids this quarter. Always the bridesmaid.

XIA YOURAN
They want a fight?

MANAGER LI
Then we double down. Take Block 3 at any cost.

XIAO FAN
(quietly)
Longding...

XIA YOURAN
(icy)
Two days of meetings, and your strategy is 'copy Longding'?

MANAGER WANG
Their analytics are oracle-level. They don't make mistakes.

CO-WORKER B
(grabbing Xiao Fan's arm)
Don't even think about it. Those guys break people for sport.

Xiao Fan brushes him off. Walks straight to Xia Youran.

XIAO FAN
President Xia—walk away from Block 3.

XIA YOURAN
(turns)
Do I know you?

MANAGER ZHANG
(backing her up)
This is a private meeting.

MANAGER WANG
Step back. Now.

XIAO FAN
Longding's pulling out at three o'clock. Can Tianyu swallow a two-billion-dollar hole?

XIA YOURAN
continuation:
(frozen, searching his face)
No. It can't be...

MANAGER ZHANG
Based on what? Your gut?

XIAO FAN
Based on five years of watching them.

Xiao Fan turns. Retrieves his dented scooter helmet.

XIAO FAN
(over his shoulder)
We'll meet again, President Xia.

He kickstarts his scooter—the tiny engine WHINING against the purr of V8s.

MANAGER ZHANG
(mutters)
Delusional.

Her phone BUZZES. She answers. The blood drains from her face.

MANAGER ZHANG
(into phone)
Confirm that. Longding's entire stake?

She hangs up. Dead silence.

MANAGER WANG
They withdrew?

MALE SUBORDINATE
If we'd leveraged up... we'd be finished.

MANAGER LI
Bankrupt by dawn.

MANAGER ZHANG
(whispers)
He knew.

XIA YOURAN
(staring at the scooter's dust trail)
Not knew. Remembered. Find him.

EXT. STREET - EVENING

Xiao Fan's scooter putters to a stop. He checks his wallet—empty. A RED NOTICE peeks from his pocket: RENT OVERDUE.

His phone RINGS.

XIAO FAN
(into phone)
Mike. You still owe me for the Johnson job. I'm outside your place right now.

The line goes dead.

XIAO FAN
(sighs)
Great. Another ghost.

He pockets the phone. Headlights BLARE—three black SUVs box him in.

SONG QI'AN (40s) emerges, suit impeccable, eyes respectful.

SONG QI'AN
Dragon.

XIAO FAN
(quietly)
Five years, Qi'an. You were supposed to forget.

SONG QI'AN
The world didn't forget. They need you back.

ON SCREEN: TO BE CONTINUED

title: Apocalypse
description: The Dragon Marshal of Great Xia, Ye Lingtian, defeats his enemies but chooses to return to his wife, taking a mysterious pill that strips him of his power and memory, only to awaken three years later.
context:
Title: Apocalypse
Description: The Dragon Marshal of Great Xia, Ye Lingtian, defeats his enemies but chooses to return to his wife, taking a mysterious pill that strips him of his power and memory, only to awaken three years later.

INT. PALACE - DAY

YE LINGTIAN and the EMPRESS OF GREAT XIA sit across a Go board in the silent throne room. The black stones hold a decisive advantage.

Shadows coalesce at the balcony. YAKSHA KING and ASURA KING materialize, backed by twelve ARMORED ASSASSINS. Their blades drip with spectral poison.

EMPRESS OF GREAT XIA
(eyes on the board)
Dragon Marshal, the southern border has fallen. Your move.

YE LINGTIAN
(places a white stone)
The game was won three moves ago.

ASURA KING
(mocking)
Drinking wine and playing Go while your empire burns. The Apocalypse Dragon Marshal—truly unprecedented.

ENEMY COMMANDER
After today, Great Xia will no longer have that name. After you die, we shall gladly accept your Empress.

YAKSHA KING
Dark Court rules ninety-nine kingdoms. Great Xia is the hundredth. Surrender the throne, or we take it in blood.

ENEMY COMMANDER
(drawing his sword)
Kill them both!

The EMPRESS remains composed, pouring wine into YE LINGTIAN's cup.

YE LINGTIAN
Wait for me to return. Then we'll drink.

YE LINGTIAN rises. His movements blur—precise, economical. Each assassin falls before their blade can clear its sheath. He returns to his seat, not a hair out of place.

EMPRESS OF GREAT XIA
The wine is still warm. Your sword hasn't slowed.

YE LINGTIAN drains the cup in one motion.

YE LINGTIAN
This board was set for you. Now that the great task is complete, I shall store away my weapons.

EMPRESS OF GREAT XIA
(standing, voice trembling)
Where are you going? Ye Lingtian, you are not allowed to leave! The nine provinces, supreme royal power—none of it compares to a single finger of yours. Bring the Dragon Ring!

A HANDMAIDEN brings a sandalwood box. The EMPRESS opens it to reveal an imperial seal.

EMPRESS OF GREAT XIA
From this day, you are Emperor. I am Empress. The empire and its beauty—all yours.

YE LINGTIAN
(pushing the box away)
Empire and beauty hold no interest. My wife has waited three years. She has not betrayed me. I cannot betray her.

EMPRESS OF GREAT XIA
She's a woman from the lowest class. How can she compare? She loves your invincible bearing. If you became less than ordinary, would she still love you? Do you dare to find out?

She opens her palm. The WORRY-FREE ELIXIR rests there, glowing with internal light.

YE LINGTIAN takes it without hesitation, turns, and walks toward the doors.
continuation:
INT. ABANDONED WAREHOUSE - DAY

Three years later. YE LINGTIAN—plaid shirt, glasses askew—lies crumpled on concrete. YOUNG MASTER WEI'S SUBORDINATES and three THUGS surround him.

YOUNG MASTER WEI'S SUBORDINATE
(laughing)
Look at this stupid dog.

YOUNG MASTER WEI'S SUBORDINATE
(crouching, contemptuous)
Your mistake was looking at Zhang Xue. Young Master's fiancée.

He produces a bottle of yellowed liquid.

YOUNG MASTER WEI'S SUBORDINATE
Drink this. Forget her. Or we make you forget everything.

He tips the bottle toward YE LINGTIAN's face.

YE LINGTIAN
(struggling)
No—my suit—

YOUNG MASTER WEI'S SUBORDINATE
(angry)
You dare resist?

A THUG hands him a baseball bat. He swings it down on YE LINGTIAN's skull.

The scene strobes: ancient palace, wine cup, glowing pill, the EMPRESS's face.

YE LINGTIAN collapses, blood pooling beneath his head. He goes limp.

YOUNG MASTER WEI'S SUBORDINATE
Let's go.

The THUGS turn. Behind them, golden light spills across the concrete. YE LINGTIAN slowly rises, his eyes no longer human—ageless, pitiless.

YE LINGTIAN
(coldly)
Stop right there.

The light intensifies, blinding.

END SCENE

title: After My Daughter's Suicide, I Returned to the Year 2000
description: A successful businesswoman's daughter is driven to suicide by bullying. After losing her, she is given a chance to go back and change everything.
context:
Title: After My Daughter's Suicide, I Returned to the Year 2000
Description: A successful businesswoman's daughter is driven to suicide by bullying. After losing her, she is given a chance to go back and change everything.

EXT. SCHOOL - ROOFTOP - DAY

MENG XIAOWAN, a girl in a school uniform, stands on the edge of the rooftop, her eyes filled with despair.

Below, several CLASSMATES look up at her, mocking her mercilessly.

FEMALE CLASSMATE A
Oh, Meng Xiaowan, why are you trying to jump like everyone else?

MALE CLASSMATE
Jump then!

FEMALE CLASSMATE B
Jump and show us.

FEMALE CLASSMATE C
Yeah, are you jumping or not? Don't waste my lunch time.

Pain flashes across MENG XIAOWAN's face as memories of being bullied flood her mind.

INT. SCHOOL - RESTROOM - DAY (FLASHBACK)

Several FEMALE CLASSMATES corner MENG XIAOWAN in the restroom, throwing things at her.

FEMALE CLASSMATE A (V.O.)
Meng Xiaowan, you bastard child!

INT. SCHOOL - AUDITORIUM - DAY (FLASHBACK)

MENG XIAOWAN is pushed to the ground, surrounded by several FEMALE CLASSMATES.

MENG XIAOWAN
(hurt)
I have a mother!

FEMALE CLASSMATE A
Who's ever seen your mother? Has she ever come to parent-teacher meetings?

FEMALE CLASSMATE B
Still useless.

FEMALE CLASSMATE C
What's the point of good grades?

FEMALE CLASSMATE A
You're just a bastard child!

FEMALE CLASSMATE A picks up a hot curling iron and presses it against MENG XIAOWAN's arm.

MENG XIAOWAN
(screaming)
Ahhh!

END FLASHBACK.
continuation:
EXT. SCHOOL - ROOFTOP - DAY

MENG XIAOWAN snaps back to reality, trembling as she takes out her phone.

EXT. YUNCHENG AIRPORT - DAY

NARRATOR (V.O.)
Fifteen years ago, Chen Yilian lost her husband. She fought her way out of poverty, building an empire to protect her daughter. She was wrong.

A helicopter lands on the tarmac. CHEN YILIAN, wearing a trench coat and sunglasses, walks out of the helicopter with a powerful presence. Her fiancé, XU DANIAN, waits at the end of a red carpet with a group of BODYGUARDS in black suits.

XU DANIAN smiles and approaches, taking CHEN YILIAN's bag. Her phone rings in his hand. The caller ID shows "Xiaowan."

XU DANIAN
Your daughter.

CHEN YILIAN glances at the phone, then waves her hand dismissively.

CHEN YILIAN
Tell her I'm in a meeting.

She walks toward the waiting car. Xu Danian answers.

EXT. SCHOOL - ROOFTOP - DAY (INTERCUT)

MENG XIAOWAN hears Xu Danian's voice.

XU DANIAN (V.O.)
Xiaowan? Your mother will call you tonight.

The call disconnects. Meng Xiaowan stares at the screen, her eyes completely losing their light.

INT. CHEN YILIAN'S SEDAN - DAY

CHEN YILIAN sits in the back seat, scrolling through a long text message from her daughter, frowning. The phone rings again. Xiaowan. She answers.

EXT. SCHOOL - ROOFTOP - DAY (INTERCUT)

MENG XIAOWAN
(crying)
Mom, in my next life, I don't want to be your daughter anymore.

INT. CHEN YILIAN'S SEDAN - DAY (INTERCUT)

CHEN YILIAN's expression changes drastically, her pupils dilating.

CHEN YILIAN
(shouting at the driver)
Quick, turn around! Now! Turn around! Hurry!

CHEN YILIAN's expression is filled with terror and despair.

title: I Can Travel Back and Forth
description: A young woman delivering medical supplies accidentally crosses into an ancient battlefield and saves a general, discovering she can travel between two worlds.
context:
Title: I Can Travel Back and Forth
Description: A young woman delivering medical supplies accidentally crosses into an ancient battlefield and saves a general, discovering she can travel between two worlds.

INT. CAR/EXT. BAMBOO FOREST - DAY

A white SUV navigates a dirt road through dense bamboo. Medical supply boxes visible in back.

Inside the car, a young woman wearing glasses (YANG XIN) drives. Her phone BUZZES. She pulls over, gets out, holding it up.

YANG XIN
(answering the phone)
Hello? Supervisor?

SUPERVISOR (V.O.)
(voice breaking up)
—Shuhou Village before dark, you're fired!

YANG XIN
(irritated)
What a terrible place!

YANG XIN turns. A wooden sign reading "Shuhou" flashes with light. The SUV idles past it.

She gets back in, drives forward.

EXT. ANCIENT BATTLEFIELD - DAY

The scene shifts. In the same forest, soldiers in ancient armor fight fiercely.

A general in golden armor (ZHAO CHEN) fights bravely but is outnumbered.

SOLDIER
General! We've been ambushed! You go first!

ENEMY GENERAL
Zhao Chen, surrender to our Great Xia, and I will spare your life!

ZHAO CHEN
(firmly)
I would rather die than surrender!

ENEMY GENERAL
You're asking for death! Whoever kills Zhao Chen will be rewarded with ten thousand taels and promoted three ranks! Kill!

SOLDIERS
Kill!
continuation:
INT. CAR - DAY

Yang Xin sits in the driver's seat, terrified, as if just waking from a nightmare. In her panic, her foot presses the accelerator.

EXT. ANCIENT BATTLEFIELD - DAY

The white SUV suddenly crashes into the battlefield, sending several soldiers flying, and finally knocking down the ENEMY GENERAL.

The car stops. The battlefield falls silent. Everyone stares in shock at this "iron box."

ZHAO CHEN is also stunned.

YANG XIN gets out of the car, still shaken.

YANG XIN
(to herself)
Did I...?

ENEMY SOLDIER
This demon woman killed the general! Kill her!

SOLDIERS
Kill!

The soldiers charge at YANG XIN. She screams and hides behind the car. Suddenly, all the soldiers freeze in place, flickering.

YANG XIN
(confused)
What's happening? Are they filming a movie?

ZHAO CHEN walks toward her, looking at her with complex emotions.

ZHAO CHEN
Archers!

Archers appear in the forest, drawing their bows and aiming.

YANG XIN realizes the danger and immediately grabs ZHAO CHEN's arm.

YANG XIN
Get in the car!

YANG XIN pulls ZHAO CHEN to dodge the flying arrows, pushes him into the car, quickly gets in herself, and slams on the accelerator.

The car speeds away with ZHAO CHEN inside, a group of soldiers chasing behind.

title: After Divorce, CEO Fu Tries to Win Her Back
description: Mu Nansheng confronts Fu Jincheng about her pregnancy, but he demands she terminate it to save his childhood friend. A flashback reveals how their unconventional relationship began a year ago.
context:
Title: After Divorce, CEO Fu Tries to Win Her Back
Description: Mu Nansheng confronts Fu Jincheng about her pregnancy, but he demands she terminate it to save his childhood friend. A flashback reveals how their unconventional relationship began a year ago.

INT. LUXURY LIVING ROOM - NIGHT

MU NANSHENG stands trembling, hand on her stomach. FU JINCHENG faces the window.

MU NANSHENG
(quietly)
I'm pregnant. Two months.

FU JINCHENG
(without turning)
Wan'er needs a kidney transplant. You're a match.

MU NANSHENG
The baby doesn't change that. I can still—

FU JINCHENG
(turning sharply)
Pregnancy hormones disqualify you. This child cannot exist.

He closes the distance between them.

FU JINCHENG
(low, controlled)
That fire you started three years ago. The fire that put her in that wheelchair.

He takes her wrist.

FU JINCHENG
You owe her this.

MU NANSHENG
(whispered)
No...

FU JINCHENG
The appointment is in an hour.

She wrenches backward.

MU NANSHENG
(screaming)
I won't! It's mine too!

A grandfather clock spins backward, distorting.

ONE YEAR AGO
continuation:
EXT. MODERN BUILDING EXTERIOR - DAY

MU NANSHENG, in punk attire and a beret, cradles a handmade voodoo doll. She speaks into her phone.

MU NANSHENG
(into phone)
Relax, Yunyun. By the time I'm done, he'll beg to cancel the arranged marriage himself.

INT. CAFÉ - DAY

FU JINCHENG sits alone, scrolling through a photo of a demure woman in a wheelchair. Glacial patience.

FU JINCHENG (V.O.)
Another perfectly suitable match. How predictable.

A hand-stitched doll lands on his espresso saucer. His eyes lift.

FU JINCHENG
That's not standard tableware.

MU NANSHENG slides into the opposite seat, props her boots on a chair.

MU NANSHENG
Mu Nansheng. Your blind date. This is my emotional support demon.

FU JINCHENG
(registering the name mismatch)
The file said Gu Yun. Demure. Classical piano.

MU NANSHENG
(leaning forward)
And you were described as a gentleman CEO. We both got scammed.

The corner of his mouth twitches.

FU JINCHENG (O.S.)
The doll has your eyes.

MU NANSHENG
She sees through bullshit. Says you've got a ghost on your shoulder. Female. Very angry.

FU JINCHENG
(flatly)
Does she have a name?

MU NANSHENG
Wan'er. Says you owe her a debt.

His fingers tighten on the cup. His composure cracks.

FU JINCHENG
(softly)
Then banish her.

MU NANSHENG
(standing abruptly)
She's biting your neck. Run!

FU JINCHENG
(pointing past her)
You first. Your doll moved.

MU NANSHENG
(startled)
What—

She spins, loses balance. He catches her. They accidentally kiss. Freeze.

The doll drops between them.

title: I Bring Four Treasures to Break the CEO's Ten Generations of Single Heirs
description: A woman betrayed by her family gives birth to quadruplets and reunites with their father six years later.
context:
Title: I Bring Four Treasures to Break the CEO's Ten Generations of Single Heirs
Description: A woman betrayed by her family gives birth to quadruplets and reunites with their father six years later.

INT. OPERATING ROOM - DAY

The "SURGERY IN PROGRESS" light glows red above the operating room door.

SONG QINGHUA lies on the operating table, screaming in pain as she goes through labor.

DOCTOR
Deep breaths!

NURSE
Deep breaths!

DOCTOR
Quick, get the blood supply!

SONG QINGHUA closes her eyes in agony, falling into a flashback.

MADAME HUANG (V.O.)
Song Qinghua. You served President Wang, yet return pregnant by a laborer. This disgrace ends tonight.

EXT. DOORWAY - NIGHT (FLASHBACK)

Heavy rain pours down. Pregnant SONG QINGHUA holds an urn of ashes, soaked to the bone. Across from her, her half-sister SONG YAN'ER and her stepmother MADAME HUANG stand under an umbrella, their faces carved from ice.

SONG QINGHUA
(pleading)
She's gone, Yan'er. Please. Just let me say goodbye.

SONG YAN'ER
(contemptuously)
Your mother always was in the way. Even ashes inconvenience us.

SONG YAN'ER snatches the urn easily and drops it. It shatters. Ashes scatter in the rain.

SONG QINGHUA
(heartbroken)
Mom!

SONG QINGHUA collapses to her knees, scrambling through broken porcelain. MADAME HUANG steps on her bleeding hand.

MADAME HUANG
Let me tell you plainly. My mother was his first wife. You are the mistake.

SONG QINGHUA
(in disbelief)
He wouldn't...

She looks desperately toward her FATHER, who stands coldly under an umbrella, then turns away.

SONG QINGHUA
(crying out)
The baby... please...
continuation:
INT. OPERATING ROOM - DAY (PRESENT)

The scene cuts back to the operating room. SONG QINGHUA is still in the agony of childbirth.

DOCTOR
Deep breaths, deep breaths! Push! It's coming out!

NURSE
It's a beautiful little fairy. Miss Song, you're amazing.

SONG QINGHUA barely catches her breath when another wave of pain hits. She screams again.

DOCTOR
What? There's another? Quick, keep going! Hold on, hold on, hold on, almost out! Good, it's out! There's more, quick, keep pushing! Push harder! Come on! You can do it! It's out, it's out!

SONG QINGHUA
(weakly)
Still not done?

DOCTOR
Last one! Hold on, quick! Push harder, quick! Good, it's out, it's out!

NURSE
(surprised)
How many?

DOCTOR
(counting)
One, two, three, four. Quadruplets! My God, they're quadruplets! This is a one in seven hundred thousand chance. It's a miracle!

SONG QINGHUA
(relieved)
Quadruplets. That's wonderful.

EXT. COMPANY BUILDING - DAY

ON SCREEN: Six years later.

A line of black luxury cars slowly approaches. SONG QINGHUA, wearing a delivery uniform, rides an electric scooter with a little girl, ZAOZAO, sitting in front. To avoid the convoy, SONG QINGHUA brakes hard. The scooter tips over and ZAOZAO falls to the ground.

ZAOZAO
Mommy!

SONG QINGHUA
(rushing to help her daughter)
Zaozao! Are you okay?

ZAOZAO
I'm fine. But the order spilled.

The convoy stops. Several BODYGUARDS in black suits exit. LI JINXUAN steps out of the lead Bentley, his expression cold and stern.

ZAOZAO sees LI JINXUAN. Her eyes widen. She takes a step forward.

ZAOZAO
(softly)
Daddy?

LI JINXUAN
(startled)
What did you call me?

title: Good Baby Arrives
description: A five-year-old girl is abandoned by her adoptive parents on a rainy night and desperately searches for her deceased mother.
context:
Title: Good Baby Arrives
Description: A five-year-old girl is abandoned by her adoptive parents on a rainy night and desperately searches for her deceased mother.

INT. STREET - NIGHT

A rainy night, the street is wet. XIAO TUANZI (a girl, about 5 years old) carries a white backpack, walking with difficulty in the rain. She cries while looking at a family photo in her hand.

XIAO TUANZI
(crying)
Mommy... Mommy...

INT. HOME DINING ROOM - NIGHT

A bowl is smashed on the floor.

FATHER (O.S.)
(angry)
You put saffron in your mother's porridge!

XIAO TUANZI sits at the dining table, crying sadly.

XIAO TUANZI
(crying)
I just wanted it to smell right...

FATHER points at XIAO TUANZI furiously.

FATHER
(shouting)
Your mother is dead! This one is carrying our real child!

The pregnant ADOPTIVE MOTHER walks over, stroking her belly.

ADOPTIVE MOTHER
(quietly)
She's trying to help, honey. She doesn't understand.

FATHER
(firmly)
She has to go. Tonight.

XIAO TUANZI gets down from the chair, walks to ADOPTIVE MOTHER, and reaches out her small hand wanting to touch ADOPTIVE MOTHER's belly.

Suddenly, FATHER pushes XIAO TUANZI away.

FATHER
(shouting)
No!

XIAO TUANZI is pushed to the ground, leaning against the sofa, looking at them in fear.

XIAO TUANZI
(pleading, crying)
Daddy, Mommy, please. Xiao Tuanzi will be good. I can teach baby the rules. I remember them all...

FATHER walks to ADOPTIVE MOTHER's side and comforts her.

FATHER
(to his wife, not to Tuanzi)
We'll call the agency. She needs more than we can give.

XIAO TUANZI
(crying)
Daddy, I won't make mistakes anymore...
continuation:
INT. STREET - NIGHT

The scene cuts back to the rainy street. XIAO TUANZI is alone, crying out.

XIAO TUANZI
(crying out)
Mommy... Mommy...

In the mist ahead, the figure of a woman in ancient costume holding an oil-paper umbrella appears. It is XIAO TUANZI's biological MOTHER.

MOTHER
(gently)
My good girl.

XIAO TUANZI
(surprised, crying)
You found me!

MOTHER
Come. Before it's too late.

XIAO TUANZI runs crying toward MOTHER's phantom.

XIAO TUANZI
(running and shouting)
Mommy! Don't go!

A car speeds toward her, its lights blinding. The sound of emergency braking.

The family photo floats down from the air and falls on the wet ground.

XIAO TUANZI lies in the middle of the road, unconscious, her hand reaching weakly forward.

MOTHER's phantom appears again, smiling at her.

MOTHER
(gently)
You found me first. My brave girl.

XIAO TUANZI lies on the ground, weakly reaching out her hand.

ON SCREEN: TO BE CONTINUED

title: Late Sound of Rain
description: A young woman discovers she is the lost daughter of a wealthy tycoon, but the family she serves tries to steal her identity.
context:
Title: Late Sound of Rain
Description: A young woman discovers she is the lost daughter of a wealthy tycoon, but the family she serves tries to steal her identity.

INT. SHEN FAMILY LIVING ROOM - DAY

RUOLAN, wearing a simple white suit, carries a tray of pastries toward the living room.

RUOLAN
Miss.

MISS SHEN sits on a zebra-striped sofa. She deliberately tips the tray with her foot. Pastries scatter across the floor.

MISS SHEN
You're getting worse. At least a dog learns.

RUOLAN lowers her head, hurt.

RUOLAN
I'm sorry.

RUOLAN crouches down to clean up the pastries on the floor. The TV in the background is playing the news.

TV NEWS (V.O.)
Billionaire Xiao Pingchuan announced today he's narrowed his search for his missing daughter to this district. A press conference at his estate tomorrow will reveal his findings.

The TV shows a photo of XIAO PINGCHUAN with his young daughter at a cherry blossom tree. RUOLAN sees the news and, shocked, touches the locket at her throat. She opens it—same tree, same child, but only half the photo remains.

RUOLAN
(whispering)
Mother...

MISS SHEN snatches the locket from RUOLAN's hand.

MISS SHEN
Give it to me! Where did you get this?

RUOLAN
It was my mother's.

MRS. SHEN walks over from the side. She takes the locket. Studies it.

MRS. SHEN
You will leave tonight. My daughter attends the press conference tomorrow.

RUOLAN
He'll know—

MRS. SHEN
Men see what they want. Especially fathers who've searched twenty years.

She produces a small scalpel.

MRS. SHEN
The birthmark is your proof. Remove it, and you're free. Or we remove your chance to interfere.

MISS SHEN moves forward and pins down the struggling RUOLAN.

RUOLAN
(crying out)
No! Let me go!

MRS. SHEN
Don't move.

Suddenly, a MAID runs in frantically.

MAID
Madam! Xiao Pingchuan's assistant called—he's arriving tonight instead!

MRS. SHEN and MISS SHEN freeze instantly, their faces full of shock. RUOLAN lies on the ground, covering her face, still shaken.
continuation:
INT. AIRPORT ARRIVALS HALL - DAY

XIAO PINGCHUAN walks through the terminal with his ASSISTANT, cane clicking against the floor.

XIAO PINGCHUAN
The investigator confirmed the birthmark?

ASSISTANT
Yes. She's at the Shen residence. Tomorrow's press conference is arranged.

XIAO PINGCHUAN
Tomorrow feels very far away.

They exit.

INT. SHEN FAMILY LIVING ROOM - DAY

RUOLAN lies on the floor. MISS SHEN holds the locket. MRS. SHEN stands over Ruolan.

MRS. SHEN
We have one hour. He'll verify her identity. We must ensure she has no proof.

She pulls out a small bottle.

MRS. SHEN
This chemical removes birthmarks. Painless. Or I make you disappear. Choose.

RUOLAN
(desperate but determined)
The truth doesn't need proof.

MRS. SHEN
(coldly)
Truth is what powerful men declare it to be.

MISS SHEN forces RUOLAN's head back. MRS. SHEN opens the bottle.

RUOLAN
(terrified)
Don't! Please!

MRS. SHEN
Don't move.

Suddenly, the MAID bursts in.

MAID
Madam! Xiao Pingchuan is at the gate! He demands to see Ruolan immediately!

MRS. SHEN and MISS SHEN freeze, faces full of shock. RUOLAN lies on the ground, covering her face, still shaken.

title: Reborn 2004
description: A man discovers his wife's betrayal on the same day he learns his mother has terminal leukemia.
context:
Title: Reborn 2004
Description: A man discovers his wife's betrayal on the same day he learns his mother has terminal leukemia.

INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR - DAY

ZHENG HAO stares at the diagnosis report, the paper trembling slightly in his hands. The DOCTOR stands by silently.

DOCTOR
Your mother's AML is accelerating. She needs immediate induction therapy. The targeted medication isn't covered by basic insurance.

ZHENG HAO
(voice hollow)
How much?

DOCTOR
Two million yuan. For the first cycle.

She touches his shoulder. He doesn't react.
continuation:
EXT. HOME ENTRANCE - DAY

Zheng Hao stands at his doorstep, the diagnosis heavy in his briefcase. A man's leather shoe peeks from beneath the doormat.

INT. LIVING ROOM - DAY

Zheng Hao enters. From the bedroom: a man's low laugh, Pan Lian's murmured voice. He stops, keys still in hand.

INT. BEDROOM - DAY

PAN LIAN sits on the bed with a jewelry catalog. XIMEN pours wine at the dresser.

XIMEN
He still suspects nothing?

PAN LIAN
Yoga class. Every Tuesday.

She points to a diamond necklace.

PAN LIAN
The children asked about their father. I said soon.

XIMEN
Soon. When the villa transfer clears.

Their glasses clink. The door swings open.

Zheng Hao stands motionless, the diagnosis report slipping from his fingers. The shoe, the wine, her smile—everything slots into place with devastating clarity.

ON SCREEN: TO BE CONTINUED

title: The Richest Mother, I Am Your Real Daughter
description: A baby girl is taken away at birth, believed to be a curse. Fifteen years later, her jade pendant becomes the key to finding her true family, but jealousy and deception threaten to keep them apart.
context:
Title: The Richest Mother, I Am Your Real Daughter
Description: A baby girl is taken away at birth, believed to be a curse. Fifteen years later, her jade pendant becomes the key to finding her true family, but jealousy and deception threaten to keep them apart.

INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR - DAY

SFX: Thunder

Lightning flashes across a dark sky.

SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER, wearing a hospital gown, screams emotionally.

SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER
No! No!

Two BODYGUARDS in black suits hold a baby wrapped in swaddling clothes. SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER kneels on the ground, desperately trying to stop them.

SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER
Please don't take my child! She was just born!

BODYGUARD
The Master said the astrologer predicted it—a daughter born tonight would cost the family everything by her fifteenth birthday. She must go.

SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER
No!

Another BODYGUARD steps forward.

BODYGUARD 2
Young Madam, forgive us. We have orders.

The BODYGUARDS turn to leave. SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER collapses on the ground, crying out in pain, crawling forward.

SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER
Wait!

The BODYGUARDS stop.

SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER
(sobbing uncontrollably)
Please. Let her live.

She takes off a jade pendant necklace from her neck and hands it to the BODYGUARD. The BODYGUARD takes it and turns to leave.

SHEN WAN'ER'S MOTHER
(to the departing baby)
Grow strong. I will find you.

FIFTEEN YEARS LATER
continuation:
INT. ORPHANAGE DORMITORY - DAY

Fifteen-year-old SHEN WAN'ER sits at a desk, holding the jade pendant her mother left behind.

SHEN WAN'ER (V.O.)
Fifteen years. The deadline in the prophecy.

The door bursts open. DUAN XIAOQIU, a girl wearing the same school uniform, runs in excitedly.

DUAN XIAOQIU
Wan'er! My grandmother found me!

SHEN WAN'ER
(delighted)
She's really coming?

DUAN XIAOQIU
But I want to wait until I'm off that machine. I don't want her first memory of me to be weak.

She points to the oxygen concentrator—a shared medical device for children with respiratory conditions.

DUAN XIAOQIU suddenly looks pained, clutching her chest, breathing rapidly.

SHEN WAN'ER
(supporting her)
Xiaoqiu!

SHEN WAN'ER helps DUAN XIAOQIU sit on the bed and puts an oxygen mask from a nearby machine on her face.

DUAN XIAOQIU takes deep breaths of oxygen and slowly calms down.

SHEN WAN'ER
Your heart will heal. Come on, Xuanxuan should hear this.

DUAN XIAOQIU nods. The two link arms and walk out. SHEN WAN'ER'S jade pendant remains on the desk.

Outside the door, LIN XUAN watches their departing figures, her hand on her own bare throat.

LIN XUAN (V.O.)
Third adoption. That's how many I've lost. And now you get a family too?

LIN XUAN walks into the dormitory. An envelope—Wan'er's scholarship letter—sits on the desk. She sweeps it aside. The pendant catches the light.

The DIRECTOR walks into the dormitory.

DIRECTOR
Xuanxuan, the Chen family is coming tomorrow. They've chosen Wan'er.

After the DIRECTOR leaves, LIN XUAN'S expression becomes resentful.

LIN XUAN (V.O.)
You took my chance. I'll take the only thing that matters to you.

She picks up the jade pendant from the desk and puts it in her pocket. She glances at the oxygen machine.

LIN XUAN (V.O.)
And without it, maybe they'll finally see me instead.

LIN XUAN turns to leave. Two well-dressed MEN appear at the doorway.

FAMILY SEARCH MAN
(holding a photo of a jade pendant)
Miss. We're searching for a girl born on this date, with this pendant. The Shen family matriarch's final wish.

LIN XUAN looks at the pendant in the photo. It's the same one she just took.

LIN XUAN (thinking)
Wan'er's birthday. The prophecy deadline.

A calculating expression appears on LIN XUAN'S face.

title: Terrifyingly Strong After Divorce
description: A legendary figure known as the Godmother returns home incognito after years of serving her country, hoping to reunite with her family and reveal her true identity to her husband.
context:
Title: Terrifyingly Strong After Divorce
Description: A legendary figure known as the Godmother returns home incognito after years of serving her country, hoping to reunite with her family and reveal her true identity to her husband.

EXT. HELIPAD - DAY

A white helicopter sits on the wet tarmac after the rain. ZHAO FU, QIAN BIAO, SUN WU, and others lead rows of subordinates in black suits, standing solemnly in two lines.

ZHAO FU
(clasping fists)
Zhao Fu, Qingcheng Chamber of Commerce.

QIAN BIAO
(clasping fists)
Qian Biao. Eighteen Provinces.

SUN WU
(clasping fists)
Governor Sun Wu.

ALL
(kneeling in unison, clasping fists)
Welcome home, Godmother!

A red sports car drifts onto the helipad and stops in front of everyone. They turn around in surprise.

The car door opens. A SUBORDINATE gets out with a black umbrella and opens the rear door for YOUNG MASTER PEI. PEI SHAO, wearing a black suit and holding a bouquet of red roses, steps out with an arrogant expression.

QIAN BIAO
Young... Young Master Pei?

ZHAO FU
Pei Xu?

SUN WU
The National Treasure?

ZHAO FU
(approaching with a broad smile)
Here for the Godmother?

PEI SHAO
(leaning on his car)
No. I'm here to propose.

Everyone looks shocked.

ALL
(in unison)
Propose?

PEI SHAO
(raising his voice slightly)
They call me heaven's chosen son. Unmarried. Waiting. For her.

The helicopter door opens. A woman in fashionable black athletic wear (THE GODMOTHER'S ASSISTANT) steps out.

GODMOTHER'S ASSISTANT
(coldly)
She's gone. Incognito. Clear the pad.

PEI SHAO
(frowning)
...Gone?
continuation:
EXT. TRAIN STATION PLAZA - DAY

THE GODMOTHER, wearing plain black casual clothes, carries a backpack and pulls a suitcase. She walks across the plaza with her subordinate ZHU YUE.

ZHU YUE
Godmother, let me—

GODMOTHER
Don't call me that here.

ZHU YUE
Master of the God-Making Palace. You've built empires. You're just... walking away?

GODMOTHER
(stopping)
Si Cheng carried our family alone. Duoduo doesn't even know my face.

She touches the pendant on her necklace.

GODMOTHER
(quietly)
Three days. The trillion-dollar Gu contract signs. Then I'll show him why they kneel.

ZHU YUE
And if they won't understand?

GODMOTHER
Then I chose wrong. But I already chose.

She opens the locket, revealing a photo of a little girl inside.

INT. GARBAGE BIN - DAY (FLASHBACK)

A little girl (DUODUO) in ragged clothes, her face dirty, rummages through a garbage bin.

She finds a half-rotten apple.

DUODUO
(softly)
Apple...

She takes a bite. Stops. Looks toward a distant tent.

DUODUO
Grandma's still hungry.

She wraps the apple in a scrap of cloth, her small hands trembling slightly.

title: Sweet Qixi Festival
description: A single mother doing food delivery encounters the man from her past during an arranged blind date, while trying to protect her daughter from getting a stepfather.
context:
Title: Sweet Qixi Festival
Description: A single mother doing food delivery encounters the man from her past during an arranged blind date, while trying to protect her daughter from getting a stepfather.

INT. HOTEL CORRIDOR - NIGHT (FLASHBACK)

A woman in a white dress (XINBAO'S MOM) walks briskly down the corridor, then swipes her card to enter a room.

INT. HOTEL ROOM - NIGHT (FLASHBACK)

MR. GU lies sleeping on the bed.

XINBAO'S MOM quietly lies down beside him. MR. GU turns and embraces her.

MR. GU wakes up. They gaze at each other deeply, then kiss.

MR. GU's hand caresses XINBAO'S MOM's hand and discovers she is clutching a jade pendant tightly. His fingers graze the engraved character—"bao."

EXT. MODERN CITY - DAY

ON SCREEN: Eight Years Later

INT. OFFICE/CAFE - DAY

BOSS (O.S.)
Mr. Gu.

The BOSS stands before MR. GU and his assistant HE YU.

BOSS
The delivery platform acquisition. Final terms are...

MR. GU
(to He Yu)
He Yu, you're in charge of moving this forward.

HE YU
Yes, Mr. Gu.

BOSS
(bowing)
Thank you, Mr. Gu, thank you so much. Good.

The BOSS leaves happily.

HE YU
Mr., Mr. Gu.

MR. GU
Speak.

HE YU
The old master has arranged several more blind dates for you. For Qixi festival.

MR. GU
(slams the table)
Cancel all of them!

HE YU
But... but...

MR. GU
(glaring at him)
Hmm?

HE YU
Ah, yes, yes. I'll get back to work then.

HE YU hurries away.
continuation:
EXT. STREET - DAY

XINBAO'S MOM, wearing a food delivery uniform, holds her daughter XINBAO's hand while talking on the phone.

XINBAO'S MOM
(into phone)
Mom, I don't want to go on blind dates anymore.

XINBAO'S GRANDMA (V.O.)
You stubborn girl! Your brother's future depends on you. Tonight, seven. Don't shame us.

XINBAO'S MOM angrily hangs up the phone.

The BOSS walks out of a building.

XINBAO'S MOM
(surprised)
Boss!

XINBAO'S MOM pulls her daughter and runs over, but the BOSS has already walked away.

XINBAO'S MOM
(relieved)
That was close.

XINBAO
Mom, you're just looking for a dad for me, right? Can't you just pick someone?

XINBAO'S MOM
What are you thinking? Some stepfathers take your voice before your candy. Remember Auntie Lin?

XINBAO
(nods)
They sent her away.

XINBAO'S MOM
So we stick to the plan. Quick and clean.

XINBAO
200 then.

XINBAO'S MOM
What?

XINBAO
Performance fee.

XINBAO'S MOM
(holds up five fingers)
50.

XINBAO
100.

XINBAO'S MOM takes out a hundred yuan from her pocket and hands it to XINBAO.

XINBAO
(taking the money)
Deal.

XINBAO'S MOM
Let's go.

INT. RESTAURANT - DAY

XINBAO'S MOM walks into the restaurant with XINBAO.

XINBAO'S MOM
Remember what to say?

XINBAO
I remember, I remember.

XINBAO suddenly points excitedly in a direction.

XINBAO
Hey, Mom, look, there's a handsome guy.

XINBAO'S MOM looks in the direction her daughter is pointing and sees MR. GU sitting at a table.

Their eyes meet. Both freeze, recognizing each other.

title: The Yang Family Villa
description: A woman's carefully planned transfer of her legacy sets off a chain of events that unravels a web of deception, culminating in a hospital revelation that questions everything she thought she knew about family.
context:
Title: The Yang Family Villa
Description: A woman's carefully planned transfer of her legacy sets off a chain of events that unravels a web of deception, culminating in a hospital revelation that questions everything she thought she knew about family.

INT. VILLA LIVING ROOM - DAY

MOTHER-IN-LAW, YANG XIAOYAN, ZHAO WENBIN, and their son TAOTAO (9) examine documents spread across the coffee table.

MOTHER-IN-LAW
(thumbing through a stack)
Thirty-five properties. All for my grandson's future.

TAOTAO
(bored)
Can I go play now?

MOTHER-IN-LAW
Not yet, sweetheart. Mommy needs to sign everything first.

YANG XIAOYAN
(hesitant)
Mother, are you sure this is necessary? Taotao's only nine.

ZHAO WENBIN
She's right to worry, but the lawyers say it's better this way. Protects everything from your uncles' legal challenges.

YANG XIAOYAN
(signing the last document)
Father built this empire for our family. Not for them.

MOTHER-IN-LAW watches her sign, a flicker of calculation crossing her face before she beams.

MOTHER-IN-LAW
Such a devoted mother. Wenbin, you've married well.

ZHAO WENBIN squeezes Yang Xiaoyan's shoulder. She smiles, but studies her mother-in-law's reflection in the darkened window.
continuation:
INT. VILLA KITCHEN/LIVING ROOM - DAY

YANG XIAOYAN is busy at the kitchen counter, her back to the living room.

MOTHER-IN-LAW sits on the sofa, eating fruit while making a call.

MOTHER-IN-LAW
(quietly into phone)
She signed the properties. But the company shares—her father's voting rights—those are still in her name. We need a more permanent solution.

TAOTAO zooms through the living room on a scooter, weaving between furniture.

YANG XIAOYAN
(without turning)
Taotao, not in the house.

MOTHER-IN-LAW
Let the boy play.

MOTHER-IN-LAW waves him on, then casually drops a grape stem on the floor. She continues her call.

TAOTAO rounds the corner sharply. His scooter wheel catches the grape stem. He loses control and crashes into the side table, hitting his head on the marble edge.

YANG XIAOYAN hears the impact and spins around.

YANG XIAOYAN
(screaming)
Taotao!

She runs to him. Blood pools beneath his head. MOTHER-IN-LAW stands frozen, the phone still to her ear.

INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR - DAY

YANG XIAOYAN paces, her knuckles white around her phone. The NURSE approaches with a clipboard.

YANG XIAOYAN
How is he?

NURSE
Stable, but he needs blood. You're his mother—what's your blood type?

YANG XIAOYAN
A-positive. Same as his father's. We had it tested for school.

NURSE
(frowning at the chart)
That's... problematic. The screen shows he's Rh-negative. Extremely rare—the "panda blood type." We need a full panel and paternal confirmation.

YANG XIAOYAN
Rh-negative? But that's not possible. Neither of us...

Her voice trails off. She stares at the nurse, then looks down at her phone—at a photo of Taotao and Zhao Wenbin laughing together. Something in their features. The shape of their eyes. The set of their jaw.

YANG XIAOYAN
(quietly)
Neither of us has that blood type.

NURSE
We'll need your husband's blood work immediately. Is he here?

YANG XIAOYAN
Not yet.

She looks back at the photo. For the first time, she really looks at it. At them.

YANG XIAOYAN (V.O.)
If it's hereditary... and neither of us carries it...

The realization hits like ice water. She grips the phone tighter and turns toward the emergency room doors, her expression hardening from fear to something else entirely.

title: Not Being a Stepfather, I Took Off
description: A man who prioritized his stepchildren over his own daughter is abandoned by them when he falls ill. Given a second chance, he travels back in time to fix his mistakes.
context:
Title: Not Being a Stepfather, I Took Off
Description: A man who prioritized his stepchildren over his own daughter is abandoned by them when he falls ill. Given a second chance, he travels back in time to fix his mistakes.

EXT. VILLA ENTRANCE - NIGHT

A white sedan glides to a stop. HE HU steps out, mid-20s, designer clothes hanging loose like armor. He doesn't look at the wheelchair-bound figure being shoved through the front door.

CHEN XUERU (40s, sharp features) and XU FENG (20s, delicate, avoiding eye contact) dump a worn suitcase beside the wheelchair. It spills open—pill bottles scatter on concrete.

CHEN XUERU
(frosted smile)
Your real family's waiting.

HE HU joins them, a cluster of PERFUMED WOMEN trailing behind. He lights a cigarette, the flare illuminating his bored expression.

HE HU
(shoving the wheelchair)
Down you go.

HE QINGJUN (60s, frail) topples onto pavement. Breath knocked out. No one moves to help.

HE HU
(to the women, gesturing with cigarette)
Remember that investment I mentioned? This is the asset that depreciated.

CHEN XUERU
(covering a laugh)
Hu!

HE HU
(studying He Qingjun)
Mom's daughter always came first. Isn't that right, Feng?

XU FENG
(staring at her phone)
Can we just go? I'm cold.

Thunder rolls, low and distant.

CHEN XUERU
(brightening)
Of course, baby. I'll make dumplings. Your favorite.

SHE clicks the suitcase shut with her foot. They turn.

HE HU
Dinner first. Then we'll call the lawyer about the house papers.

He flicks the cigarette. It bounces near He Qingjun's hand.

CHEN XUERU
(over her shoulder)
You chose this.

XU FENG
(doesn't look back)
Don't clog our drain.

The door snaps shut. Locks click.

A black umbrella blooms in the downpour. HE AN'AN (30s, rainwater streaming off her trench coat) stops. Sees the figure on the ground.

The door cracks open. Chen Xueru's smile vanishes, then reforms—crueler.

CHEN XUERU
Oh. An'an. Perfect timing.

XU FENG
(slipping inside)
Mom, hurry.

HE HU
(laughs)
Natural selection.

The door shuts again. This time, the porch light dies.

HE AN'AN stands in the rain, umbrella forgotten. She watches He Qingjun struggle to breathe.
continuation:
EXT. VILLA ENTRANCE/FLASH INSERTS - CONTINUOUS

As An'an watches, images flicker:

- A young girl's blistered feet in sandals, snow falling.
- A boy tearing into roast duck while small hands press against a fogged window.
- A child's voice: "Dad, it's cold."

BACK TO SCENE:

HE AN'AN
(quietly)
Thirty years. I waited for this moment.

She crouches. The rain has plastered his hair to his forehead.

HE AN'AN
You don't recognize me, do you?
