Window down. Can you speak?

CHUBBY DRIVER
Mm... Guoming Hospital...

JIANG YUEQIN
I'm a doctor. Let me check.

She opens the door, takes his pulse.

JIANG YUEQIN
Appendicitis. This will ease it.

She pulls a sterile acupuncture kit from her bag, inserts a needle.

CHUBBY DRIVER
(gasps)
The stabbing... it's gone.

JIANG YUEQIN
(removes needle)
Go to this ER. Don't stop for lights.

She closes his door. The sedan speeds off.

INT. LUXURY CAR - DAY

ZHOU ZHENHUA witnessed everything. He touches his mouth ulcer.

ZHOU ZHENHUA
(to himself)
She didn't hesitate.

XIANG DONG
(returns to car)
Chairman, the hospital consultation—

ZHOU ZHENHUA
Cancel it. Find her clinic.

He watches JIANG YUEQIN walk away, then deletes "Sunday Marriage Interviews" from his phone calendar.

FADE OUT.

title: Lost Lamb (Episode 49)
description: A wife receives a suspicious tip about her husband's whereabouts at a hotel, leading her to confront a potential betrayal.
context:
Title: Lost Lamb (Episode 49)
Description: A wife receives a suspicious tip about her husband's whereabouts at a hotel, leading her to confront a potential betrayal.

INT. HOTEL ROOM/HOTEL CORRIDOR - DAY

A WOMAN IN RED wearing a red silk blouse examines herself in front of the bathroom glass door.

WOMAN IN RED (V.O.)
Let's see what Xu Zhimo's wife thinks of her perfect husband now.

CUT TO: WIFE wearing a white dress, walking anxiously through the hotel lobby.

WIFE (V.O.)
Zhimo, would you really do something to betray me?

CUT BACK TO: WOMAN IN RED, her expression cold and calculated.

WIFE continues running through the corridor, phone clutched tightly.

WIFE (V.O.)
Please don't be in that room.

WOMAN IN RED takes out lipstick and touches up her makeup in the mirror.

WOMAN IN RED (V.O.)
The show is about to begin.

WIFE walks with a panicked expression.

WIFE (V.O.)
You would never betray me, right?

WIFE walks toward the elevator.
continuation:
INT. HOTEL CORRIDOR - DAY

WIFE walks down the corridor and suddenly hears sounds coming from Room 603.

FEMALE VOICE (O.S.)
Come on, don't stop...

MALE VOICE (O.S.)
You're insatiable, you know that?

FEMALE VOICE (O.S.)
Only for you, Xu. Don't make me wait.

MALE VOICE (O.S.)
Patience, baby.

WIFE stops outside the door, her face pale. She raises her trembling hand.

Knock knock.

Silence. She knocks harder.

KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK!

The door opens. She stares into the room in horror.

A hand lands on her shoulder.

EXT. STREET - NIGHT
(20 MINUTES EARLIER)

WIFE stands on the street, looking dazed. LIN DAN walks over.

LIN DAN
Hey, long time no see. How have you been lately?

WIFE
Sister Lin Dan, what a coincidence. Aren't you at work? I just talked to Zhimo on the phone, he said he was working overtime at the company with you in a meeting, discussing the resort project proposal.

LIN DAN
(awkwardly)
Ah, well...

WIFE
What's wrong? Is something the matter?

LIN DAN
Well, it's not really my place to say.

WIFE
Sister Dan, you and I knew each other before Zhimo and I got married. So first and foremost, you're my friend, and only secondly are you my husband's boss. So what is it that you can't tell me?

LIN DAN
Oh, I'm afraid that saying it will affect your marriage.

WIFE
(expression grave)

LIN DAN
Forget it. Lidu Hotel, Room 603. Go see for yourself.

LIN DAN turns and leaves. WIFE stands frozen in place, her face filled with shock and determination.

ON SCREEN: TO BE CONTINUED...

title: That New Year's Eve, Never to Meet Again in Life or Death
description: A mother loses her voice searching for her children in the snow after they mysteriously disappear on New Year's Eve, only to discover her husband's dark secret.
context:
Title: That New Year's Eve, Never to Meet Again in Life or Death
Description: A mother loses her voice searching for her children in the snow after they mysteriously disappear on New Year's Eve, only to discover her husband's dark secret.

EXT. VILLAGE SQUARE - NIGHT

Snow falls gently on the village square. Red lanterns sway above. YOUNG SONG ZE (8) and YOUNG SONG YA (6) dance in circles, tracing patterns with sparklers.

SONG PING (40s) approaches, his smile tight at the edges.

SONG PING
Xiao Ze, Xiao Ya. Time to go.

YOUNG SONG YA
Where, Dad? We just started.

SONG PING
Your mother's waiting. In the city.

YOUNG SONG ZE
Mom? She's home?

SONG PING
She sent a car. For New Year's.

The children's faces light up. Song Ya drops her sparkler, runs to the waiting car. Song Ze follows, then stops.

YOUNG SONG ZE
Aren't you coming?

SONG PING
Dad has preparations here. Call me when you arrive.

The children climb into the car. It pulls away, red tail lights bleeding through snow.

Song Ping watches until it vanishes. His smile fades. He pulls out a phone, dials.

SONG PING
(into phone)
It's done. They're on their way.

He hangs up. A complex emotion crosses his face—something between relief and dread.

FLASHBACK:

INT. SONG FAMILY HOME - DAY - THREE YEARS AGO

Liu CUILAN (30s) stands with a suitcase. Young Song Ya clings to her leg, sobbing.

YOUNG SONG YA
Mom, don't go! I hate you!

Liu Cuilan kneels, wipes tears.

LIU CUILAN
I'll be back soon. I promise.

She kisses Song Ya's forehead. The child turns away.

BACK TO PRESENT:
continuation:
INT. SONG FAMILY HOME - NIGHT - ONE HOUR LATER

The front door bursts open. LIU CUILAN enters, snow dusting her coat. She scans the empty room.

LIU CUILAN
Song Ping? Kids?

SONG PING sits in shadows, perfectly still.

LIU CUILAN
Where are they?

SONG PING
You tell me.

LIU CUILAN
What?

SONG PING
They left this.

He slides a crumpled paper across the table. She grabs it.

INSERT: Childish scrawl—"Mom, we went to find you. Don't worry."

LIU CUILAN
(fading)
Ze'er's handwriting...

SONG PING
(quietly)
I came home. They were gone.

LIU CUILAN
But—they don't know the way. They can't—

SONG PING
You work in that city three hundred days a year. Maybe they learned the route.

A barb hidden in concern. Liu Cuilan's hands shake.

LIU CUILAN
We have to call—

SONG PING
And tell them what? That their mother was too busy for them? That she finally came home and they're missing?

LIU CUILAN
Song Ping, please—

SONG PING
(rising)
You look. I'll... wait here.

He turns away. In the window reflection, his expression hardens—calculating, not grieving.

EXT. VILLAGE STREETS - DAY

MONTAGE - TWO DAYS OF SEARCHING

-- Liu Cuilan runs door to door, snow soaking her shoes.

-- She tapes flyers to every pole: MISSING in bold characters.

-- At a bus station, she shows the flyer to a DRIVER. He shakes his head.

-- She stands at a crossroads, spinning in circles, calling their names until her voice cracks.

-- Night falls. She collapses against a wall, missing person flyers falling from her frozen hands.

Her voice grows HOARSER with each call.

INT. HOSPITAL WARD - DAY

Liu Cuilan wakes to white walls. She tries to speak—nothing emerges but air.

Her fingers fly to her throat. The DOCTOR (50s) enters with a chart.

DOCTOR
Vocal cord hemorrhage. Three days of screaming in subzero temperatures. The damage is permanent.

Liu Cuilan stares, silent tears beginning.

DOCTOR
(gently)
You can learn to sign. You can write.

Liu Cuilan grabs a pen from his pocket, scribbles on a tissue: "MY CHILDREN?"

The doctor's face falls. He shakes his head.

Liu Cuilan crumples, soundless sobs shaking her shoulders.

INT. SONG FAMILY HOME - DAY - ONE WEEK LATER

Liu Cuilan returns. The house is silent. She moves like a ghost, touching the children's small coats, their drawings on the wall.

She finds the note again on the table. Studies it. Something's wrong—the handwriting too perfect, the words too mature.

She flips it over. A phone number. Smudged. City area code.

Her eyes narrow. She looks toward the bedroom where Song Ping sleeps, then back at the number.

She folds the note, tucks it into her shirt, close to her heart.

Her silence has become armor.

FADE OUT.

title: Rebirth of the Prodigal Son (Episode 75)_1
description: A wealthy CEO is murdered by his own son and reborn five years in the past, given a chance to change his fate.
context:
Title: Rebirth of the Prodigal Son (Episode 75)_1
Description: A wealthy CEO is murdered by his own son and reborn five years in the past, given a chance to change his fate.

INT. COMPANY CELEBRATION BANQUET - DAY

Distant view of a city skyline with tall buildings.

The company celebration banquet is in progress. A red banner hangs on the background wall reading "Jianghe Group - Celebrating Our IPO."

A group of employees in business attire stand in a row, applauding enthusiastically. Colorful confetti falls from above.

CHU JIANGHE, a middle-aged man in a blue suit, spirited and confident, walks into the venue with a smile, waving to the employees. The applause grows louder.

CHU JIANGHE walks to the podium, smiling.

FEMALE EMPLOYEE
Congratulations, President Chu! We just hit a trillion in valuation!

MALE EMPLOYEE
The board's calling you Emperor of Daxia!

The employees applaud enthusiastically again. CHU JIANGHE smiles and waves to everyone.

CHU JIANGHE
Jianghe Group's achievements belong to each one of you.

The employees applaud.

CHU JIANGHE
(laughing)
These old bones are about to retire. I hope you'll all support my son when he takes over.

EMPLOYEES
Yes!

The employees applaud warmly. CHU JIANGHE applauds along with them.

Suddenly, the phone on the podium rings. The caller ID shows "CHU TIANCI."

CHU JIANGHE picks up the phone and answers.

CHU JIANGHE
(smiling)
Tianci, did you see the—

KIDNAPPER (V.O.)
Mr. Chu. We have your son. Transfer five hundred million to the account we're texting. Twenty minutes.

The smile on CHU JIANGHE's face freezes instantly, turning to shock.

KIDNAPPER (V.O.)
Don't involve police. Or we send him back in pieces.

CHU TIANCI (V.O.)
(strangled)
Dad, please hurry...

CHU JIANGHE
(anxiously)
Don't hurt him! I'll pay!

The call disconnects. A text pings with an offshore account number.

CHU JIANGHE
(shouting into the phone)
Tianci! Hello! Hello!

He frantically puts down the phone, immediately rushes down from the podium, and runs out.
continuation:
EXT. ABANDONED INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX - DAY

CHU JIANGHE rushes onto the rooftop, clutching his phone. Transfer confirmed.

CHU JIANGHE
(shouting)
I transferred it! Let him go!

CHU TIANCI, a young man in a red jacket, walks out from the other side with two thugs.

CHU JIANGHE
(relieved)
You're safe—

CHU TIANCI
(mocking)
Safe? Father, I'm finally free.

CHU JIANGHE
(confused)
What are you saying?

CHU TIANCI
Fifteen years. You controlled my schools, my friends, my engagement. You even chose my major.

CHU TIANCI
But you can't control my inheritance. The moment you die, it's all mine. That's what I needed from you.

CHU JIANGHE
(stricken)
The will... you altered it...

CHU TIANCI
Goodbye, Father.

The thugs move in. CHU JIANGHE swings his phone but they overwhelm him, striking his knees. He collapses.

CHU TIANCI
(calmly)
Enough.

They drag the bruised CHU JIANGHE to the edge. He clutches at CHU TIANCI's leg, leaving a bloody print.

CHU JIANGHE
(whispering)
I only wanted you to have a better life...

CHU TIANCI
You wanted a puppet. I want my life.

He kicks CHU JIANGHE's hand away. CHU JIANGHE falls backward.

CHU JIANGHE (V.O.)
If I could go back... to when I still had a son...

CHU JIANGHE crashes heavily to the ground. His cracked phone shows a photo of young Tianci.

Time-travel special effects sequence.

INT. LUXURIOUS LIVING ROOM - DAY

CHU JIANGHE suddenly awakens to find himself sitting on a luxurious European-style sofa. He wears a casual blazer.

CHU TIANCI, five years younger, stands before him, trembling with rage.

CHU TIANCI
(roaring)
You think money fixes everything? Lili's gone! You paid her to leave!

CHU JIANGHE is stunned, recognizing this moment.

CHU JIANGHE
(internal monologue)
What's going on?

He looks around and sees a desk calendar showing "March 2015."

CHU JIANGHE
(shocked, internal monologue)
I've been reborn. Five years before he killed me.

A golden light envelops CHU JIANGHE.

FADE OUT.

title: Reborn Treasure Appraisal - Global Concubine Selection & Treasure Appraisal - Life Reversal
description: A man is chased and betrayed after stealing a valuable Tang Sancai artifact, only to discover his wife orchestrated everything.
context:
Title: Reborn Treasure Appraisal - Global Concubine Selection & Treasure Appraisal - Life Reversal
Description: A man is chased and betrayed after stealing a valuable Tang Sancai artifact, only to discover his wife orchestrated everything.

EXT. HIGHWAY - DAY

A white sedan tears down the highway, a black SUV riding its bumper.

INT. PROTAGONIST'S CAR - DAY

The PROTAGONIST drives frantically while talking on the phone.

PROTAGONIST
Honey, what's happening? Why are they—

WIFE (V.O.)
Lose them. Meet me at the dock.

The call disconnects.

PROTAGONIST
Han'er?

INT. PURSUIT CAR - DAY

The BLACK-CLAD LEADER sits in the passenger seat, ordering the driver.

BLACK-CLAD LEADER
Close the gap. Don't let him slip away.

BLACK-CLAD DRIVER
Eighty million yuan Tang Sancai in that car—
continuation:
EXT. HIGHWAY - DAY

The SUV surges forward, trying to box the sedan in. The sedan swerves, clips the guardrail – SPARKS ERUPT.

INT. PURSUIT CAR - DAY

The BLACK-CLAD DRIVER attempts to ram the PROTAGONIST's car.

BLACK-CLAD DRIVER
You're going to kill us!

BLACK-CLAD LEADER
Just stop him.

EXT. HIGHWAY - DAY

Spike strips fly from the SUV. The protagonist's tires explode. His car spins, slams into the barrier. The SUV screeches to a halt.

The protagonist stumbles out, clutching a velvet-wrapped bundle. BLACK-CLAD MEN surround him.

BLACK-CLAD LEADER
The Xia family doesn't forgive thieves.

BLACK-CLAD MAN
(ripping away the velvet)
The Tang Sancai is fake!

BLACK-CLAD LEADER
(furious)
What?

He grabs the ceramic horse and SMASHES it against the ground. Fragments scatter.

BLACK-CLAD LEADER
(to the protagonist)
Still playing games?

The BLACK-CLAD MEN beat him. He curls up, blood pooling. A city bus barrels toward them.

CRUNCH.

INT. HOSPITAL WARD - DAY

The protagonist lies bandaged, on a ventilator. A DOCTOR prepares a syringe.

The WIFE, in a red silk dress, sits beside him.

His eyes flutter open.

PROTAGONIST
(weakly)
...Han'er... the Tang Sancai...

WIFE
(smiling)
The Tang Sancai? I know.

She leans in, her voice honeyed poison.

WIFE
I'm the one who stole it.

FADE OUT.

title: Mr. Gu's Secret Love
description: A young woman is pressured by her family to go on blind dates for dowry money, only to discover her date is the nephew she once promised to marry.
context:
Title: Mr. Gu's Secret Love
Description: A young woman is pressured by her family to go on blind dates for dowry money, only to discover her date is the nephew she once promised to marry.

INT. STREET - DAY

The ELDEST DAUGHTER OF THE SHEN FAMILY rides an electric scooter and stops by the roadside. She takes out her phone.

The phone rings.

ELDEST DAUGHTER answers the phone.

AUNT WANG (V.O.)
Three hundred thousand. He's waiting.

ELDEST DAUGHTER
That's enough for everything?

AUNT WANG (V.O.)
Every debt. Now go.

ELDEST DAUGHTER hangs up. She takes a deep breath.

INT. SHEN FAMILY HOME - DAY

ELDEST DAUGHTER returns home. SHEN'S MOTHER and SHEN'S YOUNGER BROTHER stand in the living room.

SHEN'S MOTHER
You'll go. You'll say yes.

ELDEST DAUGHTER
Mom, he's fifty—

SHEN'S MOTHER
And he'll pay your brother's way. That's what matters.

SHEN'S YOUNGER BROTHER
Just do this one thing. Please.

ELDEST DAUGHTER looks at her brother, then her mother.

ELDEST DAUGHTER
I'll bring you the money. Then I'm done.

She turns and leaves.
continuation:
INT. STREET - DAY

ELDEST DAUGHTER sits on her electric scooter. She checks her phone - a photo of MR. ZHANG, distinguished but older.

ELDEST DAUGHTER
(to herself)
Three months. Then I'm free.

INT. GU MINGZE'S OFFICE - DAY

GU MINGZE wears a suit. SPECIAL ASSISTANT LI enters with a group of BODYGUARDS.

EVERYONE
Hello, Mr. Gu.

GU MINGZE
What's this?

SPECIAL ASSISTANT LI
Old Madam's orders. The café. The blind date.

GU MINGZE
Fine. But why the escort?

SPECIAL ASSISTANT LI
Precaution. She doesn't remember you.

The BODYGUARDS leave.

GU MINGZE
And the money?

SPECIAL ASSISTANT LI
Transferred to Shen family this morning.

GU MINGZE
Good.

INT. CAFÉ - DAY

ELDEST DAUGHTER walks into the café and sees GU MINGZE sitting by the window.

ELDEST DAUGHTER (thinking)
Wrong table. Too young. But...

ELDEST DAUGHTER walks over and sits down across from GU MINGZE.

ELDEST DAUGHTER
Hello. I'm here for the blind date.

GU MINGZE
I know. I arranged it.

ELDEST DAUGHTER
You're not—

GU MINGZE
I'm Gu Mingze. The nephew you left behind.

FLASHBACK - INT. GARDEN - DAY

YOUNG GU MINGZE picks a rose and walks toward his AUNT sitting on a swing.

YOUNG GU MINGZE
Aunt, this flower is for you.

AUNT
Thank you, my dear nephew.

YOUNG GU MINGZE
When I grow up, I'm going to marry you.

AUNT
But I'm your aunt—

YOUNG GU MINGZE
Grandma said you were adopted. So we can.

AUNT
(smiling)
Then wait for me.

INT. CAFÉ - DAY

Back to reality, GU MINGZE and ELDEST DAUGHTER look at each other.

GU MINGZE
I waited fifteen years.

ELDEST DAUGHTER
You bought my family's debt.

GU MINGZE
I bought our promise.

ELDEST DAUGHTER
That was a child's game.

GU MINGZE
Was it?

He places a small velvet box on the table.

The image freezes on ELDEST DAUGHTER's hand, reaching toward it.

title: After the College Entrance Exam, I Became Famous Nationwide
description: A man reborn from 60 years in the future must choose between revealing advanced technology or living a normal life as he faces the college entrance examination.
context:
Title: After the College Entrance Exam, I Became Famous Nationwide
Description: A man reborn from 60 years in the future must choose between revealing advanced technology or living a normal life as he faces the college entrance examination.

INT. DAXIA TECHNOLOGY EXPO - DAY

A packed auditorium. LI XIUXIU stands center stage, gown shimmering.

LI XIUXIU
Ladies and gentlemen, welcome. Thank you all for attending this Daxia Technology Expo. First, our distinguished guests.

She gestures to the front row.

LI XIUXIU (V.O.)
Professor Wang Chuan from the Daxia Research Institute.

PROFESSOR WANG CHUAN smiles and waves.

LI XIUXIU (V.O.)
Professor Li Feng from the Daxia Physics Research Institute.

PROFESSOR LI FENG retains a serious expression.

LI XIUXIU
And finally, the organizer, the youngest Nobel Prize nominee, Professor Xu Qing.

PROFESSOR XU QING sits, expression calm, phone in hand.

Audience whispers rise.

FEMALE AUDIENCE MEMBER A
I heard Professor Xu organized this for some unknown scientist.

MALE AUDIENCE MEMBER A
Rumors say he's mastered controlled nuclear fusion.

PROFESSOR LI FENG overhears, lip curling.

LI FENG
(muttering)
I heard lithography machines.

XU QING checks her phone: "Are you here? Today you will stand on the world stage. I'm waiting for you." Her mouth quirks slightly.
continuation:
INT. CHENG DENGMING'S BEDROOM - DAY

A levitating sphere pulses blue light. CHENG DENGMING watches the expo stream on his laptop. His exam admission ticket lies torn in half.

CHENG DENGMING (V.O.)
Reborn from sixty years forward. Should I reveal controlled nuclear fusion sixty years early, or take the college entrance exam step by step?

He zips the sphere into his backpack. The glow persists.

INT. CHENG DENGMING'S HOUSE - LIVING ROOM - DAY

CHENG'S FATHER burns incense before his late wife's portrait. The expo broadcast plays on TV.

CHENG'S FATHER
Dengming's mother, today our son takes your dream to Tsinghua. Bless him.

The doorbell rings. TEACHER WANG YONGCHANG enters with firecrackers.

WANG YONGCHANG
Time to make history!

CHENG DENGMING walks out, backpack glowing faintly.

CHENG DENGMING
Teacher Wang. Burn those for Mom. I'm not going.

CHENG'S FATHER
Dengming!

WANG YONGCHANG
Dengming!

CHENG DENGMING
Dad, Mom wanted me to live. Not just survive. I have to try.

He exits. The sphere's glow intensifies.

INT. DAXIA TECHNOLOGY EXPO - DAY

XU QING stands at the podium, staring at the entrance. Nothing.

LI XIUXIU
Professor Xu?

XU QING
(into microphone)
Cheng Dengming is saying goodbye to the life his mother wanted. So he can build the world she deserved.

She looks into the camera.

XU QING
Take your time. The future waits.

ON SCREEN: TO BE CONTINUED

title: Redemption in Darkness & Time's Gentle Warmth (Episode 69)
description: A bodyguard proposes to a woman haunted by a tragic past, triggering memories of betrayal and the loss of her daughter ten years ago.
context:
Title: Redemption in Darkness & Time's Gentle Warmth (Episode 69)
Description: A bodyguard proposes to a woman haunted by a tragic past, triggering memories of betrayal and the loss of her daughter ten years ago.

EXT. STREET - NIGHT

Rain sheets the asphalt. SHEN SHIYANG (30s) stands beneath a streetlight, arms open. Across the street, XU ZINAN (30s) approaches with an umbrella.

ON SCREEN: Redemption in Darkness

INT. BANQUET HALL CORRIDOR - DAY

SHEN SHIYANG and LU ZEMING (40s) walk down a marble corridor. SHEN SHIYANG wears black tactical gear; LU ZEMING, a tailored suit.

INT. BANQUET HALL - DAY

The hall stands empty. Morning light filters through tall windows.

SHEN SHIYANG
The arrangements?

LU ZEMING
Ready.

LU ZEMING picks up a massive bouquet of red roses from a service cart. Hands them to SHEN SHIYANG.

LU ZEMING
(indicating reception area)
I'll monitor from here.

SHEN SHIYANG
Alright.

SHEN SHIYANG walks toward the windows. LU ZEMING watches him go, his professional mask slipping.

LU ZEMING (V.O.)
Ten years. When does protecting become penance?
continuation:
INT. RESTAURANT - DAY

XU ZINAN sits by a window in a white dress, turning a wooden pendant over in her hands.

SHEN SHIYANG enters with the bouquet. He sets it down, drapes his jacket over a chair, then kneels, opening a ring box.

SHEN SHIYANG
Let me carry what you shouldn't have to.

XU ZINAN
(whisper)
Shen Shiyang...

She looks from him to the pendant. Her breathing shallows.

FLASHBACK

Ten years ago

INT. LIVING ROOM - DAY

YOUNG LU ZEMING (20s) strikes YOUNG XU ZINAN (20s). She stumbles.

XU ZINAN
Where's Nuannuan?

LU ZEMING
With someone who deserves her.

He moves to strike again. She flinches.

LU ZEMING
You forced my hand.

EXT. STREET - DAY

NUANNUAN (5) struggles as a masked figure drags her toward a white van.

NUANNUAN
Mommy!

A KIDNAPPER clamps a hand over her mouth.

KIDNAPPER
Quiet.

YOUNG XU ZINAN bursts from the building. Sees the van doors slam shut.

XU ZINAN
Nuannuan!

She runs. The van lurches forward, clipping her leg. She crashes down.

A sedan swerves, SMASHING into a dumpster. YOUNG SHEN SHIYANG (20s) leaps out.

YOUNG SHEN SHIYANG
Don't move!

He runs to YOUNG XU ZINAN. Blood seeps from her forehead.

XU ZINAN
(weak)
They took her...

Sirens wail, distant. The van speeds through traffic, gone.

YOUNG SHEN SHIYANG
I will find her. I swear to you.

He pulls out his phone, dialing with shaking hands.

ON SCREEN: TO BE CONTINUED
